spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The host casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The host makes two Mind Spike attacks.

action.name: Mind Spike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Barrage {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 17}, up to three creatures the host can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 1d8}; save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Thought Shield
entries: {@actTrigger} The host or a creature it can see fails a saving throw or is hit by an attack. {@actResponse} The target rolls {@dice 1d6} and adds the result to its AC or saving throw, potentially turning a hit into a miss or a failure into a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, +4 to spell attacks):

action.name: Force Dart
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) Force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Academy Rings (1/Day)
entries: The mage can cast a spell from Spellcasting without expending a use of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mage makes four Prismatic Blast attacks.

action.name: Prismatic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (mage's choice).

bonus.name: Misty Step {@recharge 5}
entries: The mage casts {@spell Misty Step|XPHB} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

reaction.name: Contingency (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The mage would become {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} from a spell. {@actResponse} The mage casts {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB} (level 5 version) targeting itself.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Academy Rings (1/Day)
entries: The mage can cast a spell from Spellcasting without expending a use of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mage makes two Prismatic Blast attacks.

action.name: Prismatic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (mage's choice).

bonus.name: Misty Step {@recharge 5}
entries: The mage casts {@spell Misty Step|XPHB} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The outcast casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The outcast makes two Shadow Bolt attacks.

action.name: Shadow Bolt
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the outcast's next turn.

bonus.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
entries: The outcast magically summons three {@creature Dretch|XMM|Dretches} or one {@creature Quasit|XMM}. The summoned creatures appear in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the outcast, whom they obey. They take their turns immediately after the outcast. The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the outcast dies, or until dismissed by the outcast as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The dragon has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase the dragon's starting hit points and hit dice by 95 ({@dice 7d12 + 49}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dragon takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: The dragon always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the dragon can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the dragon takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) Force damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 22}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) Force damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 22}, one creature within 20 feet of the dragon. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Force damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Mindfire
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d8} Psychic). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Terrifying Roar (Recharges after a Short Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 21}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the dragon that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Breathe Deep (1/Round)
entries: The dragon's Breath Weapon recharges. The dragon can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the first {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it has taken this round.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Special Recharge)
entries: The dragon can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the last {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it takes this round. It chooses one of the following effects

action.name: Mutation Breath
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 21}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 72 ({@damage 16d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Instead of rolling to determine if it gains a mutation, the target automatically gains a mutation. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Madness Breath
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 21}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 66 ({@damage 12d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: 132 ({@damage 24d10}) Psychic damage, and the target instead has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wild Magic Breath
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 21}, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 55 ({@damage 10d10}) Radiant damage, and the target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The dragon chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The dragon can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Draconic Rebuke
entries: {@actTrigger} The dragon becomes {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. It can use this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} even if it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. {@actResponse} All conditions and spells on the dragon immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action and ignoring {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. The dragon recharges and immediately uses its Terrifying Roar.

monster.name: Agog
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The agog has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The agog makes one Claw attack and one Bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Gobble
entries: The agog makes a Bite attack against a {@condition Prone|XPHB} creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alienist casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Lie Detection
entries: The alienist always knows if it hears a lie, and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks.

trait.name: Unmatched Intellect
entries: The alienist adds its Intelligence modifier to its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alienist makes three Mind Thrust attacks.

action.name: Mind Thrust
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) Force damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet in any horizontal direction.

action.name: Mass Manipulation {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, up to six creatures within 60 feet of the alienist that can see and hear it. {@actSaveFail} The target must use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. The alienist chooses the direction of the movement and the target of the attack or cantrip.

action.name: Nerve Gas (1/Day)
entries: The alienist creates a 10-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} of psychoactive fog centered on a point it can see within 60 feet. The fog spreads around corners and renders its area {@variantrule Heavily Obscured|XPHB}. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it.

A creature that enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave int} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The alienist teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

reaction.name: Mind Over Matter
entries: {@actTrigger} The alienist takes damage. {@actResponse} The alienist gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the triggering damage.

monster.name: Allopine
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The allopine has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The allopine makes three Quill attacks.

action.name: Quill
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The allopine takes the {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Contaminating Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the Amalgamation is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 20}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Amalgamation's starting hit points and hit dice by 175 ({@dice 10d20 + 70}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Amalgamation has {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Malignancy
entries: The Amalgamation can't be teleported or travel to another plane against its will.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the Amalgamation is destroyed in the Mortal World, it reappears {@dice 1d10} days later with all of its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} unless its roots in the Space Between Worlds are also destroyed.

trait.name: Ultimate Corruption
entries: Necrotic damage dealt by the Amalgamation ignores {@spell Resistance|XPHB} and treats {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} as {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} instead.

action.name: The Amalgamation always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the Amalgamation can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Amalgamation takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 17}, reach 10 ft. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Amalgamation, the grapple ends and the target is swallowed. While swallowed, the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from effects originating from outside the Amalgamation, and takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) Necrotic damage and gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level at the start of each of the Amalgamation's turns.

If the Amalgamation takes 50+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in spaces within 10 feet of the Amalgamation and have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the Amalgamation dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape the corpse using 15 feet of its movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 17}, reach 60 ft. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 25}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The Amalgamation has twelve tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

items.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Amalgamation is thrown up to 60 feet, landing with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Force damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Whispers {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 25}, one creature within 120 feet of the Amalgamation. {@actSaveFail} The target becomes insane until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. While insane, the target can't take actions, understand other creatures, read, or speak anything but gibberish. A Greater Restoration or {@spell Heal|XPHB} spell ends the effect early. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 70 ({@damage 20d6}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Forced Mutation (1/Round)
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of the Amalgamation with one or more {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage and gains a randomly determined mutation.

action.name: Piper at the Gate (1/Round)
entries: A Pyknic Maunder appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the Amalgamation, acting after the Amalgamation on {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count 20 and under the Amalgamation's direct control. The Amalgamation can have up to ten Pyknic Maunders under its control at a time.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Amalgamation chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The Amalgamation can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 22}, +14 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The dragon has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase dragon's starting hit points and hit dice by 136 ({@dice 7d20 + 63}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dragon takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Order Over Chaos
entries: Whenever the dragon is present when a roll is made on the Arcane Anomaly, Drakkenheim Madness, or Mutations table, the dragon makes an additional roll on the table and chooses which result applies.

action.name: The dragon always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the dragon can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the dragon takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 18}, reach 10 ft. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) Force damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 26}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 18}, reach 10 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) Force damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 26}, one creature within 20 feet of the dragon. {@actSaveFail} 24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) Force damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Mindfire
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 25}, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d8} Psychic). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wing Blast (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 25}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the dragon. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Terrifying Roar (Recharges after a Short Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 25}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the dragon that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Breathe Deep (1/Round)
entries: The dragon's Breath Weapon recharges. The dragon can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the first {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it has taken this round. After using this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the dragon can't use its Bite or Terrifying Roar until the start of the next round.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Special Recharge)
entries: The dragon can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the last {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it takes this round. It chooses one of the following effects:

action.name: Octarine Breath
entries: The dragon breathes a 120-foot cone of prismatic rays. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose. Choose one ability score, then choose Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 25} saving throw using the chosen ability score; it takes 105 ({@damage 30d6}) damage of the chosen type on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Mutation Breath
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 25}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 90 ({@damage 20d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Instead of rolling to determine if it gains a mutation, the target automatically gains a mutation. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Madness Breath
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 25}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 83 ({@damage 15d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: 165 ({@damage 30d10}) Psychic damage, and the target instead has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wild Magic Breath
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 25}, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 83 ({@damage 15d10}) Radiant damage, and the target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The dragon chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The dragon can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Draconic Rebuke
entries: {@actTrigger} The dragon becomes {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. It can use this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} even if it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. {@actResponse} All conditions and spells on the dragon immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action and ignoring {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. The dragon recharges and immediately uses its Terrifying Roar.

trait.name: Snail Trail
entries: When the anomollusk moves through a space, it fills the space with contaminated mucus that remains for 10 minutes. A creature that ends its turn in the mucus is covered in goop and subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. Each time the creature ends its turn with the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition, it gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to clean away the goop, ending the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Slobber
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage.

action.name: Creep
entries: The anomollusk moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, and can enter the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as it does. Each creature whose space it enters is subjected once to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the anomollusk into a space of its choice. If the target chooses not to move, it suffers the effects of a failure. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition and is subjected to Snail Trail.

reaction.name: Shell Reflection
entries: {@actTrigger} The anomollusk takes damage from a spell or magical attack. {@actResponse} The attacker takes Radiant damage equal to the triggering damage and causes an Arcane Anomaly.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Apex regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn. If the Apex takes Necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Apex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The Apex's {@variantrule Long Jump|XPHB} is up to 50 feet and its {@variantrule High Jump|XPHB} is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Apex makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Lightning Bolt
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Fire Blast
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 10}, range 120 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) Fire damage, and the target and each creature within 10 feet of it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d8} Fire).

bonus.name: Cold Snap
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, one creature the Apex can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 18}). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Rapid Adaptation
entries: {@actTrigger} The Apex takes damage that isn't Necrotic or Psychic. {@actResponse} The Apex gains {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to that damage type until it is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

monster.name: Arcane Wraith

resist.note: from Nonmagical Attacks that aren't Silvered

languages: The languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcane wraith casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The arcane wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arcane wraith makes three Comet Shard attacks.

action.name: Comet Shard
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) Force damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the arcane wraith.

action.name: Nightmare Pattern {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} centered on a point the arcane wraith can see. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. The effect ends for the target if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it out of its nightmare. When the effect ends, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Vladimir von Drakken takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Daywalker
entries: Vladimir von Drakken doesn't possess any Vampire Weaknesses from the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Vladimir von Drakken's starting hit points and hit dice by 125 ({@dice 10d10 + 70}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Reborn Transformation
entries: When he finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, Vladimir von Drakken reverts to his Reborn Vladimir von Drakken form.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Vladimir von Drakken regains 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} remaining.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Vladimir von Drakken is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or dies, he drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead unless he is killed by a creature with the blood of House von Drakken within them.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Vladimir von Drakken can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Vladimir von Drakken always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Vladimir von Drakken can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Vladimir von Drakken takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bloodmourne
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 15}, reach 5 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 6d8 + 8}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

items.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 15}, reach 5 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 23}).

action.name: Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 23}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 70 ({@damage 20d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 22} Constitution save ends). Vladimir von Drakken regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. A Humanoid killed by this damage rises on its next turn as a Vampire Spawn under Vladimir von Drakken's control.

action.name: Soul Rending {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 23}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 54 ({@damage 12d8}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or More: Double damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 23}, one creature Vladimir von Drakken can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: While {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Wing Blast (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 23}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from Vladimir von Drakken. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from Vladimir von Drakken and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Before or after using this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, Vladimir von Drakken can move up to half his {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Aerial Maneuver (1/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken moves up to his {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. He can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

reaction.name: Blood Rage (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} Vladimir von Drakken becomes {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. He can use this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} even if he has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. {@actResponse} All conditions and spells on Vladimir von Drakken end unless he chooses to be affected by them, and he can move up to his {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action and ignoring {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. Vladimir von Drakken recharges and immediately uses Soul Rending.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beetle knight makes two Scything Arm-Blade attacks.

action.name: Scything Arm-Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Pincer Horn
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage, or 26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) Piercing damage if the beetle knight moved 20+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the beetle knight can't use its Pincer Horn against another target.

bonus.name: Fling
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 14}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the beetle knight. {@actSaveFail} The target is thrown up to {@dice 1d6 × 10} feet, landing with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Carapace Parry
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the beetle knight can see hits it with an attack. {@actResponse} The beetle knight adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The belfray doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The belfray has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The belfray makes two Claws attacks and one Bite attack. It can replace its Bite with Sonic Blast, if available.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Enfeebled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the belfray's next turn. The belfray regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt by its Bite.

action.name: Sonic Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the belfray that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, the belfray takes the {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Big Linda is destroyed and her corpse is left within an area of the Deep Haze for 1 hour, she is revived with all of her {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: When Big Linda starts her turn in an area of the Deep Haze, she regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Big Linda dies only if she starts her turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Big Linda makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 19}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and Big Linda can't Bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spew {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 63 ({@damage 14d8}) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Bigger Linda's starting hit points and hit dice by 74 ({@dice 4d20 + 74}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Bigger Linda is destroyed and her corpse is left within an area of the Deep Haze for 1 hour, she is revived with all of her {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: When Bigger Linda starts her turn in an area of the Deep Haze, she regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Bigger Linda dies only if she starts her turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Bigger Linda is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Bigger Linda deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Bigger Linda has {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

action.name: Bigger Linda always takes her turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On her turn, Bigger Linda can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on her turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Bigger Linda takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 15}, reach 10 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 23}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and Bigger Linda can't Bite another target.

items.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 15}, reach 15 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed 20 feet away from Bigger Linda and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Stomp
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 15}, reach 5 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) Bludgeoning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 23}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Breathe Deep
entries: Bigger Linda's Breath Weapon recharges. Bigger Linda can only take this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} as the first {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} she uses this round. After using this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, Bigger Linda can't take her Bite {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} until the start of the next round.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Special Recharge)
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 22}, each creature in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 31 ({@damage 7d8}) Necrotic damage plus 31 ({@damage 7d8}) Force damage, and the target gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Trampling Rampage (Recharges When Bloodied)
entries: Bigger Linda moves up to her {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a straight line, moving through the space of Large or smaller creatures in her path. She makes one Stomp attack against each creature she moves through.

action.name: Teleport (1/Round)
entries: Bigger Linger teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see within the Deep Haze.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Bigger Linda chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on her. Bigger Linda can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Blackjack Mel is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Blackjack Mel takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature Blackjack Mel can see deals damage to him with an attack. {@actResponse} Blackjack Mel halves the damage he takes from that attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dreg can breathe air and water.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage and is {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 2d4} Acid).

trait.name: Insect Swarm
entries: The bloated hive emits a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of buzzing insects. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Disrupt the Hive
entries: When the bloated hive dies, it immediately spawns a Swarm of Contaminated Insects in its space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bloated Hive makes two attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Spawn Swarm {@recharge 5}
entries: The bloated hive creates a Swarm of Contaminated Insects, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. The swarm takes its turn immediately after the bloated hive.

bonus.name: Distracting Swarm
entries: The bloated hive causes its Insect Swarm to fly in the face of a creature within 5 feet of it. The target can't take Reactions until the end of the bloated hive's turn.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: The leech has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks made to hide in aquatic terrain.

trait.name: Blood Bags
entries: The leech has three blood bags in its body. When encountered, roll {@dice 1d3} to determine how many blood bags are filled with blood. The rest are empty.

action.name: Attach
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 0 ft. {@h}The leech attaches to the target. While attached, the leech doesn't attack, and moves with the target, using none of the leech's movement. The leech can detach itself using 5 feet of movement, and detaches immediately if its blood bags are filled or if the target dies.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the leech with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check. {@actSaveFail} The leech is still detached, but the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}). Failure by 5 or More: The leech isn't detached and the target takes 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Blood Drain
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature. The attached creature loses 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} due to blood loss, and the blood leech fills one of its empty blood bags with some of the target's blood.

bonus.name: Blood Transfusion
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature and has at least one filled blood bag. The attached creature regains 10 {@dice 3d6} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, and the leech empties one of its filled blood bags.

monster.name: Body Snatcher
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Clinging Shadows
entries: A creature in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB} has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks to escape the body snatcher's grapple. Each time a creature attempts to escape the body snatcher's grapple while it is in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage. If this Necrotic damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, the target is stabilized but has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition for 1 hour, even if it regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: The body snatcher takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Radiant damage if it ends its turn in sunlight, and has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The body snatcher makes four Grabbing Hands attacks.

action.name: Grabbing Hands
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the body snatcher can't use this hand against another target. The body snatcher has four hands, each of which can grapple one target.

bonus.name: Shadow Teleport
entries: The body snatcher teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see that is in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}. It can bring any Medium or smaller creature it is grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination that is also in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}. An unwilling creature can make a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw to resist being teleported. On a successful save, neither the creature nor the body snatcher {@spell Teleport|XPHB}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bojack can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the bojack remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal animal corpse.

trait.name: Sudden Death
entries: Creatures that haven't yet taken a turn in combat are {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} against attacks made by the bojack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bojack makes two attacks, using Impaling Limbs or Corrosive Mucus in any combination.

action.name: Impaling Limbs
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Piercing damage and the target is {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 2d6}). While {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} in this way, the target is also {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Corrosive Mucus
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) Acid damage and the target is {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 2d4} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} in this way, the target's AC becomes 10 + its Dexterity modifier.

bonus.name: Predatory Cunning
entries: The bojack takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Cacophonous Chorus
entries: The cacophonous chimera creates a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of noise. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that can hear it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Thunder damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Cacophonous Chimera's starting hit points and hit dice by 54 ({@dice 4d12 + 20}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The cacophonous chimera has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: The cacophonous chimera always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the cacophonous chimera can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the cacophonous chimera takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Claws and Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Contaminated Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Lamprey Tail
entries: Melee {@variantrule Attack Roll|XPHB}:+11, reach 30 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}).

action.name: Aerial Maneuver (1/Round)
entries: The cacophonous chimera flies up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Cacophony (1/Round)
entries: The cacophonous chimera's three heads sing a discordant song. The effect of the song varies based on which of the chimera's head is taking the lead. Each time the cacophonous chimera uses this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, it can't use the same effect it chose last round.

action.name: Bewildering Chitter (Ratling)
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 300-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the chimera that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Chilling Howl (Garmyr)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 300-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cacophonous chimera that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Staggering Screech (Harpy)
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 300-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cacophonous chimera that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Wing Blast
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, each creature within 15 feet of the cacophonous chimera. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the chimera. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The cacophonous chimera chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The cacophonous chimera can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Crescendo of Chaos (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The cacophonous chimera becomes {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. It can take this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} even if it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. {@actResponse} All conditions and spells on the cacophonous chimera immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action and ignoring {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}.

It then unleashes a blast of thunderous power. Creatures within 300 feet of it who can hear it are subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Thunder damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition and can't stand until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Ansom is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ansom makes four attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of Ansom's next turn.

bonus.name: Flurry of Blades
entries: Ansom makes two Shortsword attacks.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature Ansom can see hits him with an attack. {@actResponse} Ansom adds 3 to his AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss.

monster.name: Cerebrograft
languages: telepathy 30 ft. The languages of its creator

trait.name: Dual Minds
entries: The cerebrograft has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Stunned|XPHB}, and {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cerebrograft makes two Slam attacks and uses Telekinetic Grip.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Telekinetic Grip
entries: The cerebrograft reaches out with its mind to hold one creature or object it can see within 120 feet of it in its psychic grasp. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target is moved up to 30 feet in any direction and has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the start of the cerebrograft's next turn or until the cerebrograft has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The cerebrograft can also exert fine control on objects with its telekinesis, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

action.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cerebrograft. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: The target instead has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Critical Condition
entries: A creature that rolls a natural 1 on a saving throw against the chemist's attacks or effects takes maximum damage from the attack or effect.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Chemist is immune to the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chemist makes one Caustic Grip attack and uses either Chemical Spray or Explosive Concoction, if available.

action.name: Caustic Grip
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}24 ({@damage 8d4 + 4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}). Until the grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the chemist can't use Caustic Grip against another target. At the end of each of its turns, the target takes 24 ({@damage 8d4 + 4}) Acid damage.

action.name: Chemical Spray
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (the chemist's choice). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Explosive Concoction {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 20-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point within 120 feet of the chemist. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (the chemist's choice), and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6}, same damage type). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Acid Rain (1/Day)
entries: The chemist conjures a storm of acid rain in a 20-foot radius, 20-foot tall {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. Exposed flames in the area are doused. Chemical pools accumulate in the area and emit thick fumes, rendering it {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} and {@variantrule Lightly Obscured|XPHB}. The storm and the pools evaporate after 1 minute.

A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 30 ({@damage 12d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Emergency Dose
entries: The chemist administers a restorative poultice to itself or a creature it can see within 5 feet that isn't a Construct or Undead. The target regains 35 {@dice 10d6} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once a creature benefits from Emergency Dose, it can't do so again until it finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

trait.name: Amorphous Form
entries: The chemystral can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Cold Vulnerability
entries: If the chemystral takes Cold damage, it becomes {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dc 15}). While it has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition, it loses its {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB|Immunities} to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage and its {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Force damage, and it gains {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Thunder damage. In addition to the normal means, the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ends if the chemystral takes 20 points of Force, Piercing, Thunder, or Slashing damage.

trait.name: Elemental Reaction
entries: If the Chemystral takes Acid, Fire, Lightning, Poison, or Necrotic damage, it takes on elemental properties which change the damage type of its Chemical Spray and Engulf actions to match that damage type. In addition, it causes an additional effect when it hits with its Chemical Spray attack:

trait.name: Acid
entries: On a hit, the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Acid).

trait.name: Fire
entries: On a hit, the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Fire).

trait.name: Lightning
entries: On a hit, the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Poison
entries: On a hit, the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Necrotic
entries: On a hit, the chemystral regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The chemystral regains 25 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn. If the chemystral takes Cold or Thunder damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The chemystral dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Sonic Neutralization
entries: When the chemystral takes Thunder damage, it loses any active benefit from its Elemental {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} trait.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chemystral makes two Chemical Spray attacks and uses Engulf.

action.name: Chemical Spray
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) Acid damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The chemystral moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the chemystral enters a creature's space, the creature is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveSuccess} The creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the chemystral. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

{@actSaveFail} The chemystral enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, and takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Acid damage at the start of each of the chemystral's turns. The engulfed creature has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from effects outside the chemystral. When the chemystral moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

The chemystral can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time. An engulfed creature can take an action to escape with a successful {@dc 17} Strength check, entering a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

trait.name: No Escape
entries: When the dreg hits a creature with an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action, that creature's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 0 until the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Bone Blade attacks.

action.name: Bone Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Force damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against any creature other than the dreg until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Sentinel Strike
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 5 feet of the dreg takes the {@action Disengage|XPHB} action or makes a melee attack roll against a target other than the dreg. {@actResponse} The dreg makes an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action against that creature.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: As long as the chitter has moved 20+ feet this turn, it has a high jump and long jump of 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chitter makes two Sharpened Claws attacks and one Acrid Bite attack. It can also use Chitter, if available.

action.name: Acrid Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Sharpened Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Chitter {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature within 120 feet of the chitter that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the chitter's next turn.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The chitter moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see. If it ends this movement adjacent to the creature, it gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against that creature until the end of its turn.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: {@actTrigger} The chitter takes falling damage and doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition. {@actResponse} The triggering damage is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Psychic Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 4d4 + 3}) Psychic damage.

trait.name: Dispersal
entries: When the congregation is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it leaves behind {@dice 2d4} Pilgrims in its place.

trait.name: Mob
entries: The congregation can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the congregation can move through any opening large enough for a Medium Humanoid. The congregation can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The congregation makes one attack against each creature in its space.

action.name: Torches
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 0 ft. {@h}The target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Fire).

action.name: Pitchforks
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 0 ft. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) Piercing damage, or 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage if the congregation has the {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} condition. The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Trample
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, one creature in the congregation's space that has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The crater wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrowing {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and leaves a 10-foot diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crater wurm makes a Bite attack, then makes Bite attacks against each creature adjacent to the first target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) Piercing damage, and if it is Large or smaller, the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveFail} The target is swallowed by the wurm. The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against effects originating from outside the wurm, and takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. A creature that takes this Necrotic damage must also succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or gain one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

If the wurm takes 30+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in spaces within 10 feet of the wurm with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Breach
entries: The wurm moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, entering the spaces of Large or smaller creatures. Each creature whose space it enters is subjected once to the following effect. At the end of its movement, the wurm can make one Bite attack against a {@condition Prone|XPHB} creature as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}. {@actSave str} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the wurm into a space of its choice. If the target chooses not to move, it suffers the effects of a failure. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the wurm and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Aura of Storms
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Crimson Countess takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Lightning damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Crimson Countess's starting hit points and hit dice by 39 ({@dice 6d8 + 12}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Pluck
entries: The Crimson Countess doesn't need to spend extra movement to drag a Medium or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it.

action.name: The Crimson Countess always takes their turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On their turn, the Crimson Countess can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Crimson Countess takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Grasping Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}).

items.name: Lightning Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Lightning damage.

action.name: Aerial Acrobat
entries: The Crimson Countess flies up to her {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Frightful Screech (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, one creature within 120 feet of the Crimson Countess that can hear them. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target must take the {@action Dash|XPHB} action and move away from the Crimson Countess by the safest available route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move.

action.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creatures in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Crimson Countess chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on them. The Crimson Countess can use this action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a Bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Crimson Axe
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/90 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Force damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the vampire's choice. {@hom}After being thrown, the axe returns to the vampire's hand.

action.name: Crackling Smite
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Unholy Smite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the end of the vampire's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wrathful Smite
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

bonus.name: Charge
entries: The vampire moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, it has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll it makes against that creature before the end of its turn.

reaction.name: Unbridled Fury
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature hits the vampire with an attack. {@actResponse} The vampire makes a Crimson Axe attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Vladimir von Drakken takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Vladimir von Drakken's starting hit points and hit dice by 76 ({@dice 9d8 + 36}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Reborn Transformation
entries: When Vladimir von Drakken consumes the blood of six living creatures of level or challenge rating 10 or higher, he transforms into Reborn Vladimir von Drakken. His {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} doesn't change. If he is destroyed before he can feed sufficiently, he must begin the process again when he rejuvenates.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Vladimir von Drakken regains 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} remaining.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Vladimir von Drakken is destroyed in his crypt-starved form, he crumbles into ash and reforms {@dice 1d10} days later with all of his {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. His new body appears within his crypt in the Brachenwald. Casting Hallow on the druidic shrine prevents his new body from returning so long as the spell remains in effect.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Vladimir von Drakken always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Vladimir von Drakken can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Vladimir von Drakken takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bloodmourne
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

items.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 18}).

action.name: Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 40 ({@damage 10d6 + 5}) Necrotic damage. The target's {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} Maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and Vladimir von Drakken regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to that amount. A Humanoid killed by this effect and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a Vampire Spawn under Vladimir von Drakken's control.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 18}, one creature Vladimir von Drakken can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: While {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Shadow Step (1/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet that is in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}. He has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next melee attack he makes before the end of this round.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. He can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Refracted Beam attacks.

action.name: Refracted Beam
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the start of the dreg's next turn.
