If this attack deals a different damage type due to Refract Elements, it has additional effects:

action.name: Acid or Fire
entries: The target is also {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 2d6}) of the corresponding damage type.

action.name: Cold
entries: The target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} {@variantrule Condition|XPHB} ({@dc 13}).

action.name: Lightning
entries: The target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} {@variantrule Condition|XPHB} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Refract Elements
entries: {@actTrigger} The dreg takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage. {@actResponse} The dreg gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the triggering damage type, including the triggering damage, until the end of its next turn. During its next turn, its Refracted Beam attack deals damage of that damage type instead of Radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with its Eye Laser.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Eye Laser
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Force damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it disintegrates into a pile of fine delerium dust.

bonus.name: Wink {@recharge 4}
entries: The hulk vanishes from the Material Plane and is transported to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of its next turn, it returns to an unoccupied space of its choice within 10 feet of the space it vanished from. If no unoccupied space is available within that range, it appears in the nearest unoccupied space (chosen at random if more than one space is equally near).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Bite, Unholy Light, or Spellcasting.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Spiritual Maul
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) Force damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the vampire.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) Necrotic damage, and the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Unholy Light {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 10-foot radius, 40-foot high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point the vampire can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Blood Rebuke
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the vampire can see within 60 feet of it deals damage to it. {@actResponse d}{@actSave con} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The dark growth can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The dark growth regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn. If the Dark Growth takes Fire or Radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the dark growth's next turn. The dark growth dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dark growth makes three attacks: two with its Entangling Vines and one with its Infection Spores.

action.name: Entangling Vines
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 30 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}) and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Infection Spores
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 60 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on its turn, the target must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of that attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save. Subsequent Failures: The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Third Success: The disease ends.

An infected creature that dies or undergoes a Monstrous Transformation becomes a Dark Growth Shambler. A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell or similar magic that removes diseases ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dark growth shambler makes two Claw attacks and one Infectious Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Infectious Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on its turn, the target must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of that attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save. Subsequent Failures: The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Third Success: The disease ends.

An infected creature that dies or undergoes a Monstrous Transformation becomes a Dark Growth Shambler. A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell or similar magic that removes diseases ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

reaction.name: Abrupt Decay
entries: {@actTrigger} The dark growth shambler drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and it hasn't taken Fire damage this round. {@actResponse} The dark growth shambler creates a Dark Growth in its space.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep dreg can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Watery Camouflage
entries: The deep dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to {@action Hide|XPHB} in any area {@variantrule Lightly Obscured|XPHB} by murky water or aquatic features.

trait.name: Catch of the Day (1/Turn)
entries: The deep dreg can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a {@condition Prone|XPHB} or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} creature it hits with a weapon attack.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. A creature can take an action to free itself or another creature in a net with a successful {@dc 10} Strength check. Dealing 5 Slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

trait.name: Abyssal Aura
entries: Allies within 30 feet who can see and hear the deep knight have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} and {@condition Frightened|XPHB} conditions. The deep knight can't use this trait if it is {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep knight can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Unwavering Sentinel
entries: Creatures provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action from the deep knight even if they take the {@action Disengage|XPHB} action before leaving its reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep knight makes one Harpoon attack and one Bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the deep knight.

bonus.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deep siren casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep siren can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep siren makes two Storm Lash attacks.

action.name: Storm Lash
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the deep siren.

action.name: Discordant Song (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 15}, each creature of the deep siren's choice in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the deep siren. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target must roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the result from each {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} it makes. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. It automatically succeeds after 1 minute.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The deep siren covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and shape. The illusion ends if the siren takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the siren could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching them would feel their fishy flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) check to discern that the siren is disguised.

bonus.name: Misty Step
entries: The deep siren magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The dragon has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and uses Contaminated Rend twice.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Force damage.

action.name: Contaminated Rend
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature within 5 feet of the dragon. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Octarine Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Dimension Hop
entries: The dragon teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Misty Camouflage
entries: A dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks when taking the {@action Hide|XPHB} action in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Haze.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The digipede makes one Bite attack and two Talons attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) Slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Lightning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the digipede's next turn.

action.name: Eye Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. {@actSaveFail 2} The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. {@actSaveFail 3} The target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The psyche can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psyche makes two Electroshock attacks. It can also use Hypnotize, if available.

action.name: Electroshock
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) Lightning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the psyche's next turn.

action.name: Hypnotize {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each creature of the psyche's choice in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the psyche. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Mental Possession
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, one creature the psyche can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this psyche's Mental {@variantrule Possession|XPHB} for 24 hours. {@actSaveFail} The target is possessed by the psyche; the psyche disappears, and the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition and loses control of its body. The psyche now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The psyche can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The psyche's game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or the psyche leaves as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the possession on a success. When the possession ends, the psyche appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this psyche's Mental {@variantrule Possession|XPHB} for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The psyche teleports to an unoccupied space within 60 feet.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: Attack rolls against the dreg have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}. If it is hit by an attack roll, this trait does not apply until the end of its next turn. This trait does not apply while the dreg has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or has a {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} of 0.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The dreg teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dreg can make one melee attack. If this attack hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Reanimator casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Dr. Everett Freed, Reanimator is immune to the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Reanimator makes two Electric Jolt or Necrotic Blast attacks.

action.name: Electric Jolt
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

action.name: Touch of Death (1/Day)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}200 Poison damage. This damage ignores {@spell Resistance|XPHB} and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison damage and can't be reduced or prevented in any way. If the target is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it automatically fails death saving throws until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. A Heal or {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell ends this effect early.

action.name: Reanimate {@recharge 5}
entries: The Reanimator targets the corpse of one of its destroyed creations it can see within 30 feet. The target returns to life with 45 ({@dice 10d8}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. The target has {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to all damage and {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Creator's Command
entries: The Reanimator chooses a creature it can see that was reanimated or created by it. The target can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to make an attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} or move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Bodyguard
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the Reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator. {@actResponse} The Reanimator chooses one of its creations within 10 feet and switches spaces with it. The creation becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Contaminated Regeneration
entries: The sewer gator regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn as long as it is in contaminated water. The gator dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Amphibious Lunge
entries: If the sewer gator swims 20+ feet on its turn, it can long jump or high jump up to 60 feet. If it ends this jump within 5 feet of a creature, it has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its next Crushing Bite attack against that creature, and that attack deals an additional 40 ({@damage 9d8}) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Predatory Stealth
entries: The sewer gator has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to {@action Hide|XPHB} in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sewer gator makes two attacks. It can't make both a Crushing Bite attack and a Tail Strike attack against the same target.

action.name: Crushing Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 19}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the sewer gator can't use Crushing Bite against another target.

action.name: Tail Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the sewer gator and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Death Roll
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft., one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the sewer gator. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage. {@actSave str} {@dc 19}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions until it escapes the sewer gator's grapple.

reaction.name: Submerge
entries: {@actTrigger} The sewer gator takes damage while in water. {@actResponse} The sewer gator swims half its speed and takes the {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Blood Sacrifice
entries: A creature with the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition also has the {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition against the vampire's attacks.

trait.name: Plasma Absorption
entries: Each time a creature takes damage from the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition while within 30 feet of the vampire, the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Draining Bite or Spellcasting.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Bloodthorn Whip
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 30 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

action.name: Draining Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Bloodroots {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the vampire. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Altered Reality
entries: The cnidarian has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition for creatures {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by it.

trait.name: Hallucinogenic Bioluminescence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the cnidarian and can see it is subjected to the following effect unless the cnidarian chooses otherwise. {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, the target regards all other creatures as enemies except the cnidarian, whom it regards as an ally.

Whenever the target makes an attack or casts a detrimental spell, it must choose its target at random from the creatures it can see within range. If a creature provokes an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action from the target, it must make the attack, if able. If the target ends its turn without taking an Attack or Magic action, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

Unless {@status surprised|XPHB}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against the cnidarian until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the cnidarian in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

trait.name: Neon Illumination
entries: The cnidarian sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cnidarian makes two Tendrils attacks.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) Necrotic damage, or 48 Necrotic damage if the target is {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by the cnidarian.

reaction.name: Reflexive Flash
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the cnidarian can see within 30 feet deals damage to it. {@actResponse d}{@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cnidarian that can see it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Radiant damage and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: Eldrick casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 21}, +13 to spell attacks):

2e: {@spell Bigby's Hand|XPHB} (Eldrick may use an {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} to control the hand once per round)

spellcasting.name: Greater Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: Eldrick casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 21}, +13 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Academy Rings (1/Day)
entries: Eldrick can cast a spell from Spellcasting without expending a use of it.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Eldrick Runeweaver's starting hit points and hit dice by 75 ({@dice 10d8 + 30}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Eldrick has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Warding Aura
entries: Eldrick projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of warding magic. The first time on each turn that a creature within the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} deals damage or casts a spell on Eldrick, that creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Eldrick.

action.name: Eldrick always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Eldrick can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Eldrick takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Prismatic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 15}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (Eldrick's choice).

action.name: Teleport
entries: Eldrick teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet.

action.name: Chain Lightning {@recharge 5}
entries: Eldrick casts {@spell Chain Lightning|XPHB}, using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting.

action.name: Dispel Magic (1/Round)
entries: Eldrick casts {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB}, using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Eldrick chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}

. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. Eldrick can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

reaction.name: Counterspell
entries: Eldrick casts {@spell Counterspell|XPHB} in response to that spell's trigger, using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The eldritch cataclysm can enter a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Cyclonic Storm
entries: The eldritch cataclysm emits a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of high winds that disperse gases and vapors and extinguish unprotected flames. Ranged attacks that pass through the area have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}. Objects that are not worn or carried are blown away {@dice 1d6 x 5} feet in a random direction. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 17} (flying creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: The target is flung {@dice 1d6 x 5} feet in a random direction, landing with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eldritch cataclysm uses Chain Lighting or Icy Bolt, then uses Meteor Stike or Quake.

action.name: Chain Lightning
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 12}, range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Lightning damage, the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the cataclysm's next turn, and the lightning leaps to another creature of the cataclysm's choice within 15 feet of the first target. The cataclysm makes a separate {@spell Chain Lightning|XPHB} attack against the target. The cataclysm can make any number of {@spell Chain Lightning|XPHB} attacks in this way, but a creature can be targeted only once each time the cataclysm takes this action.

action.name: Icy Bolt
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 12}, range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Cold damage. {@hom}The target and each creature within 5 feet of it are subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 17}).

action.name: Meteor Strike
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 15-foot radius, 40-foot tall {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point the cataclysm can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quake
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cataclysm. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The eldritch crawler has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Insectoid Limbs
entries: The eldritch crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check. It ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, one target within 5 ft. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Contaminated Venom
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, one target within 40 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Void Walker
entries: The eldritch crawler climbs through a tear in reality, traveling from the Material Plane to the Space Between Worlds or vice versa.

reaction.name: Fractured Reality
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature misses the eldritch crawler with an attack. {@actResponse} The eldritch crawler teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet, briefly leaving behind a fractured image of itself being hit by the attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dreg casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Psychic Blast attacks.

action.name: Psychic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) Psychic damage and the dreg pushes the target 10 feet straight away from itself.

action.name: Synaptic Shock {@recharge}
entries: The dreg unleashes a storm of psychic energy in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

bonus.name: Hazewarp Hex
entries: The dreg chooses a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and one of the following conditions: {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, {@condition Clumsy|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, {@condition Enfeebled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, or {@condition Sickened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, the targeted creature. {@actSaveFail} The target becomes cursed by the dreg for one minute or until the dreg dies or uses this ability again. While cursed in this manner, a creature becomes vulnerable to Psychic damage and gains the chosen condition (sane ends). {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the dreg's Hazewarp Hex for 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trickster casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trickster makes two Psychic Blade attacks.

action.name: Psychic Blade
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) Psychic damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The trickster takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Force or Psychic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes two Claw attacks and one Bite attack. It can replace its Bite attack with Corrupting Blast if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) Piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Corrupting Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The troll blasts a corrupting beam at a point it can see within 300 feet. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, all creatures in a 10-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on that point. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage and gains a level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Forced Mutation
entries: The troll is so contaminated that it changes form constantly, growing new appendages or exploding out of its old skin into a new form. The troll may manifest one of the following mutations. The mutation stays in effect until a new one is chosen.

bonus.name: Grotesque Wings
entries: The troll gains a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} equal to is {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, but it falls if it ends its turn in the air.

bonus.name: Cyclopean Eye
entries: Corrupting Blast now recharges on a 4-6, and the troll gains Truesight 30 ft.

bonus.name: Extra Arms
entries: The troll can make two additional Claw attacks as part of the Multiattack action.

bonus.name: Spider Legs
entries: The troll gains a {@variantrule Climb Speed|XPHB} equal to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

bonus.name: Reflective Flesh
entries: The troll has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition until it makes an attack.

bonus.name: Crystalized Carapace
entries: The troll's {@variantrule Armor Class|XPHB} becomes 20.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Enduring Flame
entries: Flames within 10 feet of the elemental can't be extinguished, and the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition can't end for creatures within 10 feet of the elemental.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} in an additional 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes three Dancing Flame attacks.

action.name: Dancing Flame
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 3d6} Fire).

bonus.name: Flickerjump
entries: The elemental teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

monster.name: Entropic Watcher
languages: telepathy 120 ft. Understand all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The entropic watcher has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Corrupting Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the entropic watcher takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Entropic Watcher's starting hit points and hit dice by 73 ({@dice 7d10 + 35}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The entropic watcher has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Withering Gaze
entries: The entropic watcher's eye creates a 150-foot long, 10-foot wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line} of withering magic. At the start of each of its turns, the entropic watcher decides which way the line faces and whether the line is active. Creatures in the {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line} have {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Necrotic damage and can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: The entropic watcher always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the entropic watcher can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the entropic watcher takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 40 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The entropic watcher has ten tendrils, each of which can grapple one creature.

items.name: Insanity Beam (1/Round)
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 10}, range 60 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) Necrotic damage, and the beam leaps to another target. The entropic watcher makes another Insanity Beam attack against a new target within 30 feet of the first. A creature can be targeted by only one Insanity Beam per turn. For each additional creature the beam hits, its damage increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}).

action.name: Dimensional Glide
entries: The entropic watcher moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Shadow Crash {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 30-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point the entropic watcher can see within 150 feet. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere}'s area is filled with magical {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB} for 1 minute or until the entropic watcher uses Shadow Crash again. A creature that ends its turn in the area takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Contaminated Grasp
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the entropic watcher. {@actSaveFail} 16 ({@damage 3d10}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Force Barrier
entries: The entropic watcher creates a shimmering octarine 10-foot-by-10-foot wall of force centered on a point within 150 feet. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the entropic watcher has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or dies. The wall appears in any orientation it chooses, and can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (the entropic watcher's choice).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB}. A {@spell Disintegrate|XPHB} spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the wall.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The entropic watcher chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The entropic watcher can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Dimensional Anchor
entries: The Executioner can't be teleported or sent to another plane of existence unless it chooses to be.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Executioner's starting hit points and hit dice by 250 ({@dice 20d12 + 140}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Executioner is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the Executioner is destroyed, it reforms with all of its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} 1 minute later unless a {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell is used to stop it. A {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell used in this manner is always stressful, and the caster must roll to determine whether or not they can cast the {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell ever again.

trait.name: Necrotic Vents
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Executioner takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Stoic
entries: The Executioner can't take Reactions.

trait.name: Bound to Slaughter
entries: If the Executioner begins its turn more than 100 feet away from Slaughterstone Square, it disappears into the Haze and reappears 1 minute later at the center of Slaughterstone Square.

action.name: The Executioner always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the Executioner can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Executioner takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Lumber Forward (1/Round)
entries: The Executioner moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

action.name: Death Grip
entries: Spectral chains appear around one creature within 300 feet of the Executioner. The target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}), and it has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends. The condition ends if the Executioner uses Death Grip against a different target

action.name: Guillotine Blade
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 18}, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}45 ({@damage 10d6 + 10}) Slashing damage which ignores any {@spell Resistance|XPHB} or {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Slashing damage. Immediately after making a ranged attack, this weapon flies back to the Executioner's hands. Critical {@h}The target dies unless it has the Epic {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} action or Legendary {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} trait.

action.name: Destroyer (1/Round)
entries: The Executioner chooses a Huge or smaller object or structure within 5 feet of it. Alternatively, it can choose a spell or magical effect within 30 feet of it. The object or structure is destroyed, or the spell or effect ends.

action.name: Summon Grasping Shadows (1/Round)
entries: The Executioner targets {@dice 1d4} corpses within 300 feet of it. Each target's spirit rises as a Grasping Shadows in the nearest unoccupied space. The spirits act each round on {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count 20, and disappear if the Executioner is destroyed.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Executioner chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The Executioner can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Blessed Weapons
entries: When the Exorcist hits with any weapon, the weapon unleashes holy fire, causing the target to have the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Radiant; included in the attacks below).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exorcist makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Grasping Ghost.

action.name: Radiant Sword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Radiant).

action.name: Blessed Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 80/320 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Radiant).

action.name: Grasping Ghost
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 15}, one creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target is moved 30 feet in a horizontal direction of the exorcist's choice. At the end of this movement, the target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the exorcist's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Expel Evil (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each Celestial, Fey, Fiend, and Undead that can see and hear the exorcist. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} and {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} conditions and must move as far from the exorcist as it can on its turns. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target takes damage, the exorcist has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, or the exorcist dies.

action.name: Last Rites {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, one creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet that isn't a Celestial or Construct (Fiends and Undead have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Radiant damage. If the target is a Fiend or Undead, it instead takes 64 Radiant damage and is turned to ash if the effect reduces it to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Spiritual Healing
entries: One creature the exorcist can see regains 35 {@dice 10d6} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once a creature benefits from Spiritual {@variantrule Healing|XPHB}, it can't do so again until it finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Negate Spell (3/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet is casting a spell. {@actResponse} If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges aren't wasted.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The host casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The host makes two Enchanted Strike attacks.

action.name: Enchanted Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Illusory Assault {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the host. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the host's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Faerie Step
entries: The host teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

reaction.name: Fey Escape
entries: {@actTrigger} The host takes damage. {@actResponse} The host has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition and teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet. The host remains {@condition Invisible|XPHB} until the start of its next turn or until it makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

monster.name: Far Dweller Abductor
languages: telepathy 120 ft. understands all languages but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The far dweller casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The far dweller has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Unfathomable Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the far dweller and can see it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave int} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Unfathomable Presence of all far dweller abductors for 24 hours.

Unless {@status surprised|XPHB}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against the far dweller until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the far dweller in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

action.name: Mind Warp
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 120 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) Psychic damage, and the target must roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the result from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the far dweller's next turn.

action.name: Devour Thoughts
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 15}, one creature within 30 feet of the far dweller. {@actSaveFail} 19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Psychic damage, and the target's Intelligence score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. If this effect reduces the target's Intelligence to 0, it has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

action.name: Abduct
entries: The far dweller casts {@spell Plane Shift|XPHB} without components, targeting itself and each {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} creature within 10 feet of it.

bonus.name: Psychic Step
entries: The far dweller magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

reaction.name: Counterspell (1/Day)
entries: The far dweller casts {@spell Counterspell|XPHB} in response to that spell's trigger, using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting (Psionics).

monster.name: Far Dweller Corruptor
languages: telepathy 120 ft. understands all languages but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The far dweller casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The far dweller has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Contaminate
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, one creature within 120 feet of the far dweller. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Mind Scramble {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} (creatures maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB} have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Psychic damage, or 48 Psychic damage if the target was maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Pluck the Puppet Strings
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, one creature within 60 feet of the far dweller. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage, and the target must immediately use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a creature of the far dweller's choice. If it ends this movement within reach of the creature, it must make a melee weapon attack against the creature with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Vanish to the Space Between Worlds (3/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The far dweller takes damage. {@actResponse} The far dweller takes no damage and vanishes to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of its next turn, the far dweller reappears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 60 feet of the space it left.

monster.name: Far Dweller Mastermind
languages: telepathy 120 ft. Understand all languages but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics) (1/Round)
headerEntries: The far dweller casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}, +11 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The far dweller has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Eldritch Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the far dweller takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Far Dweller Mastermind's starting hit points and hit dice by 60 ({@dice 8d8 + 24}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Magic Deflection
entries: The far dweller has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If the far dweller is targeted by a spell of level 4 or lower, the caster must succeed on a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw or the spell fails and the caster takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage.

action.name: The far dweller always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the far dweller can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the far dweller takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Contaminate
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 19}, one creature within 120 feet of the far dweller. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Mind Scramble {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 19}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} (creatures maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB} have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 42 ({@damage 12d6}) Psychic damage, or 72 Psychic damage if the target was maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Pluck the Puppet Strings (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 19}, one creature within 120 feet of the far dweller. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Psychic damage, and the target must immediately use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a creature of the far dweller's choice. If it ends this movement within reach of the creature, it must make a melee weapon attack against the creature with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Phase Out (1/Round)
entries: The far dweller teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of the far dweller when it arrives is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave int} {@dc 19}. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Defenseless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The far dweller chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The far dweller can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Step Through Time and Space
entries: {@actTrigger} The far dweller takes damage. {@actResponse} The far dweller takes no damage and teleports to an unoccupied space within 60 feet. The next attack roll made against the far dweller has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The host casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The host makes two Fiery Claws attacks and uses Hellfire Chain, if available.

action.name: Fiery Claws
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Fire).

action.name: Hellfire Chain {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, one creature the host can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. While {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the target makes a {@dc 17} Strength check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Fiendish Agility
entries: The host takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke
entries: The host casts {@spell Hellish Rebuke|XPHB} ({@dc 17}, level 4 version) in response to that spell's trigger, using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flamekeeper casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to spell attacks):

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) Piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Searing Light
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, one creature the flamekeeper can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the start of the flamekeeper's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Radiant Flames
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature of the flamekeeper's choice in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the flamekeeper. {@actSaveFail} 16 ({@damage 3d10}) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Magical {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB} in the area is dispelled.

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The entropic watcher has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Energy Form
entries: The lepidoptera can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature is moved 20 feet in a random direction.

trait.name: Incomprehensible Vision
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the lepidoptera and can see it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is transported to the Border Ethereal. If the target is already on the Border Ethereal, they are transported to the Material Plane instead.

Unless {@status surprised|XPHB}, a creature can avert their eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of their turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the lepidoptera until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the lepidoptera in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

trait.name: Multidimensional Presence
entries: If the lepidoptera is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} but hasn't taken damage from a source on both the Material Plane and the Border Ethereal in the last round, it drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

trait.name: Phototaxis
entries: If a source of {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} is within 100 feet of the lepidoptera, it attempts to move closer to the light on its turn.

trait.name: Unraveling Reality
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the lepidoptera when it dies. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is transported from the Material Plane to the Border Ethereal, or vice versa.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lepidoptera makes two Fractal Wing attacks.

action.name: Fractal Wing
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 5d10 + 7}) Force damage.

action.name: Tessellation {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the lepidoptera that doesn't have {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}. {@actSaveFail} 44 ({@damage 8d10}) Force damage, and the target begins its next turn by moving up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a random direction.

If the target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition, it instead takes no damage, that condition ends, and the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, the target mutters rhymes in a singsong voice and dances to an unheard rhythm, moving up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a random direction at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Criss Cross
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 60 feet of the lepidoptera touches it or hits it with an attack. {@actResponse d}{@actSave cha} {@dc 17}, the attacker. {@actSaveFail} The attack deals no damage and the attacker is transported from the Material Plane to the Border Ethereal, or vice versa.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, this dreg can gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on all melee attack rolls until the start of its next turn, but attack rolls against it have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} during that time.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two attacks with its Claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

bonus.name: Bounding Leap
entries: The dreg jumps 20 feet. This movement does not count toward its total movement for the round.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the trolling remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a patch of mushrooms.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the trolling dies, it explodes in a burst of mind-affecting spores. {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature that isn't a troll in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the troll. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Spore Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the garmyr can gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Scent of Blood
entries: The garmyr's melee attacks deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The garmyr makes three Battleaxe attacks. It can also Howl, if available.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 10 feet straight away from the garmyr. Critical {@h}The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Howl {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the garmyr that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The garmyr takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} action to move toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see.

reaction.name: Retaliate
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature hits the garmyr with a melee attack. {@actResponse} The garmyr makes a Battleaxe attack against that creature.

spellcasting.name: Hunter's Quarry
headerEntries: The garmyr casts {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The garmyr has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the garmyr's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Skilled Hunter
entries: The garmyr's ranged attacks ignore Half and {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Three-Quarters Cover}.

trait.name: Kill Shot
entries: The garmyr's ranged attacks deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The garmyr makes three attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of the garmyr's next turn.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: {@actTrigger} A {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature ends its movement within 5 feet of the garmyr. {@actResponse} The garmyr moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The garmyr casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The garmyr has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the garmyr's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Aura of the Blood Moon
entries: The garmyr projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of carnage. Creatures have the {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} condition while within the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}, even if they have more than half of their {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} remaining. This effect ends if the garymyr is {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The garmyr makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Blood Call
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}).

bonus.name: Feast
entries: The garmyr makes a Bite attack against a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} target.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The war dog has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the war dog's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Feast
entries: The war dog makes a Bite attack against a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} target.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The garmyr has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the garmyr's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The garmyr makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

bonus.name: Feast
entries: The garmyr makes a Bite attack against a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} target.

trait.name: Blood Scent
entries: The ghoul lord has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks to Search for creatures who are not Constructs or Undead. It can automatically detect any creature that isn't a Construct or Undead within 10 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul lord makes two attacks.

action.name: Soulbinding Mace
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 1d6}; save ends).

action.name: Abyssal Pull
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 6}, range 120 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target is pulled 15 feet toward the ghoul lord.

bonus.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 14}, one creature within 5 feet of the ghoul lord. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 10 feet away from the ghoul lord and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: {@actTrigger} The ghoul lord is subjected to an effect that would move it, cause it to have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, or both. {@actSaveFail} The ghoul lord is neither moved nor has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Deathly Teeth
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) Necrotic damage, and the target can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of the ghoul priest's next turn.

bonus.name: Reanimate
entries: The ghoul priest chooses the corpse of a ghoul it can see within 60 feet. The ghoul returns to life with 5 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and stands up.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant ratling makes two Claw attacks and one Bite attack. It can replace up to two attacks with uses of Hurl Ratling.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage. Critical {@h}The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of the giant ratling's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Hurl Ratling
entries: The giant ratling picks up a willing Medium or smaller ratling ally or corpse within 5 feet. {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, one creature the giant ratling can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The hurled ratling takes the same damage and lands with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

bonus.name: Enrage {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant ratling gains 15 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}. Until the {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} are lost, the giant ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Strength-based {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The graffiti casts one of the following spells,requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The graffiti is incapacitated while in the area of antimagic. If targeted by {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB}, the graffiti must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become Unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The graffiti regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the graffiti is splashed with water, targeted by {@spell Prestidigitation|XPHB}, or takes Cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Its body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Solvent Susceptibility
entries: The graffiti is instantly destroyed by Universal Solvent.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The graffiti can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Surface Bound
entries: The graffiti can only move along contiguous flat surfaces, such as walls or floors.

action.name: Satire
entries: The graffiti shapes itself into a satirical representation of a foe. {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, one creature within 60 feet that can see the graffiti. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the graffiti's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Transposition
entries: The air quivers around creatures near the graffiti. {@actSave cha} {@dc 15}, up to five creatures the graffiti can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The creature teleports to an unoccupied space capable of supporting the creature within 120 feet.

action.name: Summon Public Opinion {@recharge}
entries: The graffiti conjures a swarm of Drakkenheim citizen spirits within 120 feet of itself. The swarm uses the Chorus stat block. The chorus acts immediately after the graffiti on the same {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count, and it obeys the graffiti. The chorus disappears after 1 minute or the graffiti dies

monster.name: Grasping Shadow
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but mostly just screams

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
