entries: The shadow can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Spectral Grasp
entries: The shadow causes one creature it can see within 5 feet to have the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition. A target that takes an action to escape automatically ends the grapple.

action.name: Death Row
entries: The shadow moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, pulling a creature it has {@condition Grappled|XPHB} with it.

trait.name: Dazzling Aura
entries: The gravekeeper sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 60-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Radiant damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Gravekeeper's starting hit points and hit dice by 73 ({@dice 7d10 + 35}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

action.name: The gravekeeper always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the gravekeeper can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the gravekeeper takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Lantern Blast
entries: Magical octarine beams flash from one of the Gravekeeper's many lanterns at one creature it can see within 120 feet that is not behind {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}, subjecting it to one of the following effects (the gravekeeper can only use each blast once per round):

items.name: Dispelling Blast
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Psychic damage. Any spell or magical effect on the target ends, and it has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Forceful Blast
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Force damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the gravekeeper and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Blinding Blast
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Contaminating Blast
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Igniting Blast
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 10d6} Fire). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Freezing Blast
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 18}). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Glide (1/Round)
entries: The gravekeeper moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Sludge Column {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 10-foot radius, 60-foot tall {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder}, centered on a point within 120 feet of the Gravekeeper. {@actSaveFail} 42 ({@damage 12d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Animate Walls {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, each creature within 10 feet of any number of walls within 120 feet of the gravekeeper. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 18}). The wall sprouts limbs to facilitate this grapple, which disappear when the condition ends.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The gravekeeper chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting it and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The gravekeeper can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Bite or Spellcasting.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

bonus.name: Shadow Step
entries: The vampire teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The gargantuan regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn as long as it is within the Deep Haze. The gargantuan dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Misty Camouflage
entries: The gargantuan has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to hide in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Deep Haze of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargantuan makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 15 ft. {@h}40 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl Delerium Chunk
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 12}, range 120/300 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) Bludgeoning damage and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@hom}The delerium chunk explodes creating the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 20}, the targeted creature and each creature within 10 feet of it. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage and gain one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} An Arcane Anomaly occurs in the space where the delerium chunk exploded.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bile Blast
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 10-foot cone. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Acid damage and are {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 2d8} Acid). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Hurl Fetid Flesh {@recharge 5}
entries: The Gutbuster Hulk rips off a chunk of its mutated flesh and hurls it at a point it can see within 120 feet. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, each creature within a 10-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on that point. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The dreg can take one {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} on every turn in combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Gut Flail attacks.

action.name: Gut Flail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Flailing Guts
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature enters a space within 15 feet of it. {@actResponse} The dreg makes one Gut Flail attack against that creature.

trait.name: Mutant Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the hulk to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it makes a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 5} plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. On a successful save, the hulk drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The hulk moves its speed. During this movement, it can move through the spaces of Medium and smaller creatures, as well as structures made of wood or stone that are less than 1 foot thick. When the hulk enters another creature's space for the first time during this movement, it can make one Slam attack against that creature. If the target is a creature, it is subject to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The targeted creature has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

monster.name: Haze Husk
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Death Burst
entries: {@actTrigger} The haze husk is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} by damage that isn't Radiant or from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. {@actResponse d}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the haze husk. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Haze Regent Lenore von Kessel's starting hit points and hit dice by 76 ({@dice 8d8 + 40}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: A creature starting its turn within 30 feet of Lenore is subjected to the following effect: {@actSave con} {@dc 19}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Tendrils
entries: Lenore's long hair can latch onto surfaces to pull her in any direction. She has a {@variantrule Flying|XPHB} {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} of 40 feet (included in {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}) but cannot move more than 30 feet from a solid surface, including walls and ceilings.

action.name: Lenore always takes her turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On her turn, she can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Lenore takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn.

action.name: Tentacle Hair
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 15 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Contaminated Eye Blast
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 9}, range 120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Force damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 19}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Grim Reveal (1/Round)
entries: Lenore removes her mask, revealing her horrific form. {@actSave wis} {@dc 19}, creatures within 60 feet of her who can see her. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Octarine Wall (1/Day)
entries: Lenore summons a shimmering wall within 120 feet of her. The wall can be up to 90 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 inch thick. Alternatively, she can shape the wall into a sphere up to 30 feet in diameter centered on a point she can see within range. The wall has three octarine layers. When a creature attempts to reach into or pass through the wall, it does so one layer at a time through all the wall's layers. {@actSave con} {@dc 19}. Failure:

Layer 1: 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage and the target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition; Layer 2: 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains two levels of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has the {@condition Defenseless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition; Layer 3: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains three levels of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and the {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. The wall can be destroyed by taking at least 100 Radiant or Force damage.

action.name: Radiant Gaze (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 19}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 44 ({@damage 8d10}) Radiant damage and the target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. If Lenore sees her reflection within the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}, she gains the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} conditions for {@dice 1d6} hours and can't take the Epic {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} for the duration.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Lenore chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on her. Lenore can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

monster.name: Haze Wight
languages: The languages it knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The haze wight makes two Contaminated Blast attacks.

action.name: Contaminated Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage. The first time the target is hit by a Contaminated Blast each turn, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

bonus.name: Animate Haze Husk
entries: The haze wight reanimates the corpse of a haze husk it can see within 60 feet. The haze husk is revived with 5 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and immediately stands.

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The vampire is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. The vampire may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The vampire has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the vampire's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Contaminated Bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Contaminated Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Delerium Healing
entries: The vampire touches a delerium shard and regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once the vampire has used a delerium shard in this way, it can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The vampire moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Crone Songs
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}, choosing one of the following effects. Allies of the Crone are unaffected.

action.name: Breakneck Hymn
entries: Each creature in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that can hear the harpy has {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Bludgeoning damage from falling until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Disarming Tune
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 15}, each creature in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Mesmerizing Melody
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Piercing Notes
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Thunder damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Aerial Maneuver
entries: The harpy takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Aerial Maneuver
entries: The harpy takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Chorus
entries: {@actTrigger} The harpy is within the area of another harpy's song. {@actResponse} The harpy joins in on the song, choosing a creature within 30 feet. The target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its next saving throw against the song.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage. If the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, its Intelligence score is reduced by {@dice 1d4} until it finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The target dies if this effect reduces its Intelligence score to 0.

action.name: Delerium Dust {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hazewing moth. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

bonus.name: Hypnotic Flutter
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of the hazewing moth that can see it (hazewing moths automatically succeed). {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). If the target is already {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, it instead has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). If the target is already {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, it also has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends both).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Anchored
entries: The chrysalis is firmly anchored in place. It can't be forced to move or teleport unless it chooses to be.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: The chrysalis conjures Deep Haze in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}, which renders its area {@variantrule Lightly Obscured|XPHB}. A creature that starts its turn in the area is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Harden
entries: The chrysalis regains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, gaining any excess healing as {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Sudden Emergence
entries: {@actTrigger} The chrysalis is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} Roll {@dice 1d6}. On a 6, a Hazewing Moth Adult emerges from the chrysalis, sharing its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count. On a 1-5, vile goo spills out of the chrysalis, and each creature within 5 feet of it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: He Who Laughs Last casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 26}):

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase He Who Laughs Last's starting hit points and hit dice by 125 ({@dice 7d20 + 49}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: He Who Laughs Last is immune to any effect that would sense his emotions or read his thoughts, as well as any divination spell that he refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made to ascertain the demon lord's intentions or sincerity have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Mortal Coil
entries: He Who Laughs Last projects a 150-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of death and decay. A creature that ends its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} suffers an {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level and ages 10 ({@dice 3d6}) years. The creature removes an {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level gained in this way at the end of its turn, but only if it ends its turn outside the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. A creature's original age can be restored with {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} or similar magic.

action.name: He Who Laughs Last always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, He Who Laughs Last can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, He Who Laughs Last takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Scornful Whip
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 16}, reach 120 ft. {@h}30 ({@damage 5d8 + 8}) Force damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pulled 30 feet toward He Who Laughs Last.

items.name: Walking Shadow (1/Round)
entries: He Who Laughs Last moves up to half his {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

action.name: Sleep No More (1/Round)
entries: He Who Laughs Last casts {@spell Power Word Kill|XPHB}.

action.name: Out Brief Candle (1/Round)
entries: He Who Laughs Last casts {@spell Finger of Death|XPHB} (save {@dc 24}).

action.name: Dusty Death (1/Round)
entries: He Who Laughs Last casts {@spell Disintegrate|XPHB} (save {@dc 24}).

action.name: Cage of Sorrows (1/Round)
entries: He Who Laughs Last creates a wall of bone on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet of himself. The wall appears as a flat surface made up of one 10-foot-square panel. The wall is 1 foot thick and lasts for 1 minute or until the wall is destroyed (AC 15, 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison and Psychic damage, {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Bludgeoning and Thunder damage).

If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (GM's choice) and subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: He Who Laughs Last chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. He Who Laughs Last can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

monster.name: Helpful Hand
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The hand can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Finger Jab
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}1 Bludgeoning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Latch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}The hand attaches itself to the target. While latched, the hand cannot attack. Instead, at the start of each of the hand's turns, the latched creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Necrotic damage. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the hand with a successful {@dc 13} Strength check. The hand can also detach itself at any time during its turn (no action required).

bonus.name: Helper
entries: The hand takes the Help action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ophelia casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ophelia makes two Spiritual Weapon attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Spiritual Weapon
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Healing Word (3/Day)
entries: Ophelia casts {@spell Healing Word|XPHB} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The apothecary casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, +4 to spell attacks):

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Medical Treatment (3/Day)
entries: The apothecary touches another creature. The target regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, and the apothecary ends one disease or condition affecting the target, choosing from the {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB}, and {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} conditions.

bonus.name: Adrenaline Boost
entries: One ally within 5 feet of the apothecary can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and make an attack.

spellcasting.name: Quarry
headerEntries: The scout casts {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scout makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the scout's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Smoke Bomb (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
headerEntries: The trapper casts {@spell Fog Cloud|XPHB} without the need for components, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Powder Keg
entries: If the trapper takes damage from a critical hit, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or the attack ruptures their alchemical supplies and gunpowder. Each creature within 15 feet of the trapper (including the trapper) is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Trapper's Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 60/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) Piercing damage, and the target is subjected to one of the following effects of the trapper's choice:

items.name: Bola Shot
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Tranquilizer Shot
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Net Shot (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Set Trap (5/Day)
entries: The trapper sets a trap in a space within 5 feet of it. A creature that moves within 5 feet of the trap immediately sets it off, affecting each creature in a 5-foot radius centered on the trap. The trap can be one of the options listed for the Trapper's Crossbow or one of the following additional options:

items.name: Fire Trap
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 1d8}).

items.name: Shock Trap
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Frost Trap
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 10}).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The veteran casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, +4 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The veteran makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the veteran's next turn.

bonus.name: Quarry
entries: The veteran casts {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

bonus.name: Quick Ascent
entries: The veteran moves up to 30 feet in a straight line in any direction, provided it ends its turn adjacent to a solid surface.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase the troll's starting hit points and hit dice by 54 ({@dice 4d12 + 28}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the troll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a gigantic mushroom.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rotting Aura
entries: Any creature who starts its turn in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the troll takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage unless the troll has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: On its turn, the troll can move as normal
entries: However, it does not take an action or bonus action on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the troll takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} of its choice at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Spore Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 60 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Slashing damage and if the target is Huge or smaller, the troll pulls the target up to 20 feet straight towards itself.

action.name: Entangling Mycelia (Recharge when Bloodied)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 15}, each creature of the troll's choice in a 30-foot radius centered on it. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Spawn Trolling (1/Round)
entries: The troll creates a Fungal Trolling which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of it. The fungal trolling acts immediately after the troll uses this action, then acts after the troll's turn on subsequent rounds.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The troll chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. A troll can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Lashing Tendril attacks and one Belly Maw attack.

action.name: Lashing Tendrils
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). The hulk can grapple up to two creatures at once.

action.name: Belly Maw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The hulk casts {@spell Invisibility|XPHB} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spell-casting ability.

bonus.name: Reel
entries: The hulk pulls each creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the eldritch blossom remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary flower.

action.name: Contaminated Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 2}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. If the target is {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by the eldritch blossom, it is hit automatically and has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its save.

action.name: Hypnotic Pollen (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the eldritch blossom. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition for 1 minute. While {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition and must approach the eldritch blossom on its turns, taking the most direct path possible and moving through hazards. The effect ends early if a creature takes an action to shake the target out of its stupor.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: {@actTrigger} The eldritch blossom succeeds on its save against a spell that targets only the eldritch blossom and doesn't have an area of effect, or a spell attack misses the eldritch blossom. {@actResponse} The eldritch blossom chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet as the spell's new target (the original caster is a valid target). If the spell forces a saving throw, the new target makes its own save. If the spell has an attack roll, the original caster rerolls the attack against the new target.

monster.name: Injector
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The injector makes four Syringe attacks. It can replace any number of attacks with uses of Booster Dose instead.

action.name: Syringe
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) Piercing damage, and the target is subjected to one of the following effects (roll {@dice 1d4}; reroll if the injector has already used that effect during this turn):

items.name: Lethal Injection
entries: The target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Poison damage.

items.name: Numbing Solution
entries: The target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Cold damage and is subjected to the following effect: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 16}).

items.name: Mind Dampener
entries: The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage and is subjected to the following effect: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

items.name: Induced Necrosis
entries: The target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage and is subjected to the following effect: {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Booster Dose
entries: The injector administers a tincture to a {@variantrule Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly} creature it can see within 5 feet that isn't a Construct, choosing from the effects below. Once a creature benefits from a tincture, it can't gain that benefit again until it finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

action.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: The target can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action or make one weapon attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.

action.name: Inoculation
entries: The injector chooses Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Poison damage. The target gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the chosen damage type for 1 minute.

action.name: Restorative Fluid
entries: The target regains 35 {@dice 10d6} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. If the target is already at its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} Maximum, it gains these as {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} instead.

action.name: Focus
entries: The target has the {@condition Valor|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition {@dice 1d4} for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Unstable Tank
entries: {@actTrigger} The injector would take damage. {@actResponse} The injector reduces that damage to 0, and one of its tanks violently explodes. The injector chooses one of the effects of its Syringe or Booster Dose. Each creature within 20 feet of it is affected as if the Injector hit it with its Syringe or used Booster Dose on it. The injector can't use that effect until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

trait.name: Normal Semblance
entries: The harvester has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) and Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to pass itself off as an ordinary Small Humanoid such as a Human urchin or a Halfling.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harvester makes two Surgical Claw attacks.

action.name: Surgical Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}).

action.name: Syringe (1/Day)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 11}. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Poison damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If this Poison damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it is stabilized but has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 hour, even if it regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Latch {@recharge 5}
entries: The harvester moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of a Medium or larger creature, it can make one Surgical Claw attack against that creature. {@h}The harvester attaches to the target. While attached, the harvester has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against the target. The attached harvester moves with the target, using none of the harvester's movement. The harvester can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement on its turn. A creature within 5 feet, including the target, can take an action to detach the harvester with a successful {@dc 13} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The harvester takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

monster.name: Interloper
languages: telepathy 90 ft. (conveys simple emotions) understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The entropic watcher has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Interloper is immune to the {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The interloper is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. The interloper may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The interloper has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the interloper's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The interloper makes one Spindly Claw attack and one Suckered Bite attack. If the interloper has used Siphon Spell since the end of its last turn, it can instead make three Spindly Claw or Suckered Bite attacks.

action.name: Spindly Claw
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 11}, one creature within 5 ft. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Succes: half damage only.

action.name: Suckered Bite
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 15}, one creature within 5ft. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage and the target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends) and the interloper regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} half damage only.

action.name: Delerium Healing
entries: The interloper touches a delerium shard and regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once the interloper has used a delerium shard in this way, that shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The interloper casts {@spell Plane Shift|XPHB} targeting only itself, requiring no components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The interloper teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

reaction.name: Siphon Spell
entries: {@actTrigger} A spell is cast by a creature within 60 feet of the interloper. Response - Intelligence Saving throw: {@dc 14}, that creature. {@actSaveFail} 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Psychic damage and the spell fails, but no resources are expended by the spell's casting.

trait.name: Regenerate
entries: The hulk regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn. If the hulk takes Acid or Cold damage, this trait doesn't function on the hulk's next turn. The hulk dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Out of My Way
entries: The hulk moves more than 10 feet in a straight line. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature within 5 feet of its path. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the hulk and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Rusty Blade attacks. It can replace one Rusty Blade attack with Whirlwind if available.

action.name: Rusty Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Slashing damage and the creature gains the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} {@dice 2d6} condition.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 5}
entries: The hulk twirls its blades around it in a violent, heavy swing. {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk. {@actSaveFail} 27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Rip and Tear
entries: The hulk makes one Rusty Blade attack against a {@condition Prone|XPHB} creature.

monster.name: Kingkiller Hydra
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Corrosive Aura
entries: The area within 30 feet of the hydra is filled with corrosive fumes and is {@variantrule Lightly Obscured|XPHB}. A creature that starts its turn in the fumes takes 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase the hydra's starting hit points and hit dice by 92 ({@dice 8d12 + 40}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Head Count
entries: The hydra can't make more Bite or Spit Acid attacks each round than it has heads, and each head can only be used to make one Bite or Spit Acid attack each round.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 damage or more in a single turn, one of its heads dies. The hydra dies if all of its heads are dead.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} that can be used only for {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The hydra is immune to the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} (Acid only) condition.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: The hydra always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the hydra can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the hydra takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 20 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Acid
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 14}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 8d4} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Grow Heads
entries: The hydra can only perform this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if one or more of its heads died this round, unless the head was killed by Fire damage. The hydra grows two heads, and regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Hydra Fury (1/Round)
entries: The hydra makes one Bite attack or one Spit Acid attack for each head that hasn't yet made an attack this round.

action.name: Trample (1/Round)
entries: The hydra moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action. During this movement, it can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures. Each creature the hydra moves over is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Tail (1/Round)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 15 ft. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the hydra.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The hydra chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The hydra can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Aura of Righteousness
entries: Theodore projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of radiant power. Allies in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws. A {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Knight-Captain Theodore Marshal's starting hit points and hit dice by 94 ({@dice 12d8 + 44}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

action.name: Theodore always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Theodore can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Theodore takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Holy Avenger Longsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 13}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) Slashing damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of Theodore's choice.

items.name: Divine Smite
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Searing Smite
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Fire). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Thunderous Smite
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from Theodore and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Shield
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 13}, reach 5 ft or range 30/90 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn. {@hom}After being thrown, the shield returns to Theodore's hand.

action.name: Charge (1/Round)
entries: Theodore moves up to his {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature he can see. He gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next weapon attack he makes this round.

action.name: Call the Sacred Flame {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point within 60 feet of Theodore. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Radiant damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Theodore chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. Theodore can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kronen makes two Claw attacks and uses Loathsome Presence.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Loathsome Presence
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature that can see the kronen. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition for 1 minute (save ends). If the creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the kronen's Loathsome Presence for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Scuttle
entries: The kronen takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Infestation
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the kronen. {@actResponse d}{@actSave dex} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target is covered in cockroaches. It takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage at the end of each of its turns until a creature takes an action to swipe the cockroaches off its body.

trait.name: Octarine Glow
entries: The dreg sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 15-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Arcane Hunger
entries: The dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against creatures that have one or more levels of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes three Octarine Beam attacks.

action.name: Octarine Beam
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Radiant damage, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Wave of Contamination {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage and gain one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Eternal Torment
entries: If a last memory dies, it reappears {@dice 1d4} days later, unleashing a howling scream that can be heard up to 300 feet away.

trait.name: Silhouette
entries: The last memory can only move along contiguous flat surfaces, such as walls or floors. It cannot fly or swim and must always be in contact with a surface. Additionally, the last memory ignores all natural {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} and can climb without making an ability check.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The last memory doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Sorrowful Touch
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Anguish {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the last memory that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage and the target becomes {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} {@dice 1d6} (save ends).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lenore makes three attacks with her Tentacle Hair.

action.name: Tentacle Hair
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

bonus.name: Radiant Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Radiant damage and the target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. If Lenore sees her reflection within the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}, she gains the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} conditions for {@dice 1d6} hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Petra makes three attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of Petra's next turn.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Petra takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: {@actTrigger} A hostile creature Petra can see ends its turn within 5 feet of her. {@actResponse} Petra moves up to her {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

monster.name: Liminal Herald
languages: telepathy 120 ft. understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The liminal herald has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The liminal herald makes two Eldritch Beam or contaminated touch attacks. It can also use Mind Scramble or Warp Call.

action.name: Contaminated Touch
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, one target within 5 ft. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} half damage only.

action.name: Eldritch Beam
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) Force damage.

action.name: Mind Scramble {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} (creatures maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB} have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, or 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Psychic damage if the target is maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB}.

action.name: Warp Call
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, one creature the liminal herald can see within 90 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target is teleported into an unoccupied space the liminal herald can see within 60 feet. The chosen space must be on a surface or in a liquid that can support the target without the target having to squeeze.

bonus.name: Dimension Hop
entries: The liminal herald teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

reaction.name: Reflect Pain
entries: {@actTrigger} The liminal herald takes damage from an attack or spell that only targets it. {@actResponse} The attacker or spellcaster takes Psychic damage equal to the damage dealt by the triggering attack or spell.

trait.name: Hazardous Fumes
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ooze has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the creature also has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. While the creature remains within 10 feet of the ooze, the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition cannot be removed in any way.

trait.name: Liquid Form
entries: The ooze can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) Acid damage. The ooze has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) Acid damage.

trait.name: Digestive Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the living city's space takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) Acid damage. At the start of its turn, the living city decides whether its Digestive Aura is active until the start of its next turn (no action required).

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Living City's starting hit points and hit dice by 70 ({@dice 4d20 + 28}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the living city remains motionless in its Structural Form, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary structure or vehicle, such as a house or a sailing ship.

trait.name: Structural Form
entries: The living city can spend 10 minutes in {@status Concentration|XPHB} to shape-shift into a Gargantuan structure or back into its true, amorphous form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

While in the form of a structure, the living city takes up its entire space and creates floors, walls, doorways, and windows within its space which resemble and behave like normal structures, while leaving behind open space within it to create rooms. Creatures can pass through the open spaces and stop there as if moving through a normal structure.

The walls and floors of the living city can be damaged and thus breached. Each 5-foot-by-5-foot section has AC 15 and 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Reducing a section to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} destroys it and deals 30 damage to the living city. A living city can only take this damage once per turn.

In addition, the living city extrudes pieces of itself inside its space which resemble furnishings and everyday objects. The extrusions appear, feel, sound, and behave exactly like the mimicked objects. A thin, slimy tendril connects any furnishings or objects to the body of the living city. The tendril has AC 15 and 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point}. If the tether is severed or destroyed, the simulacra melts into goo, but does no harm to the living city.

trait.name: No Exit
entries: When it rolls for {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, the living city reflexively closes the windows, doors, and other egress points on the outside of its body, preventing creatures inside it from leaving its space.

A creature in the living city's space that attempts to leave its space using teleportation or planar travel is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave cha} {@dc 20}. {@actSaveFail} 27 ({@damage 5d10}) Psychic damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The teleportation or planar travel fails.

action.name: The living city always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the living city can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the living city takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 0 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Grasping Tendril
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed or pulled 10 feet (the living city's choice).

action.name: Haunting Whispers
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 15}, one creature in the living city's space. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Shifting Form
entries: The living city alters the composition of a 10-foot-by-10-foot area inside it, creating walls, doors, windows, stairs, or furnishings. It can choose to make the area {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. Creatures inside the living city who are not directly observing the shift must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) check to notice the change.

If the living city creates a wall that cuts through another creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (the living city's choice). If a creature would be surrounded on all sides by the wall (or the wall and another solid surface), that creature can make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a success, it can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to its speed so that it is no longer enclosed by the wall.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The living city chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The living city can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Fog Form
entries: The elemental can enter a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Deep Haze
entries: A creature that enters the same space as the elemental or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Digestive Enzymes
entries: The gag fly has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} target.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The gag fly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Bloat Burst
entries: {@actTrigger} The gag fly is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or takes damage from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. {@actResponse d}{@actSave dex} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the gag fly. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid).

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The lob frog's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Poison Skin
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the lob frog hits it with a melee attack, that creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Distracted|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Throw Frogspawn
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 30/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage. If the target is a creature, the egg sticks to the target's body, melding with its flesh. A creature within 5 feet of the egg can take an action to remove the egg, dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage to the target in the process. If the egg is still attached to the target at the end of its next turn, the target is infected with a disease and has the {@condition Sickened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the disease ends. The disease can't be cured except by magic.

Every hour, the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels gained in this way can't be removed until the disease is cured. If the target suffers a Monstrous Transformation, it dies and its flesh falls away, birthing a Lob Frog.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Lord Commander Elias Drexel's starting hit points and hit dice by 85 ({@dice 10d8 + 40}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Intimidating Aura
entries: Elias projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of imposing command. An ally that start its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the first attack roll it makes before the start of its next turn. A {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature that starts its turn in the Emenation takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Thunder damage and is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to Elias's Intimidating Aura for 24 hours.

action.name: Elias always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Elias can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Elias takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Lord Commander's Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) Slashing damage, and Elias can apply one of the following martial masteries to the target:

items.name: Wound
entries: The target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

items.name: Topple
entries: The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Sap
entries: The target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll it makes before the start of start of Elias's next turn.

items.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 12}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) Piercing damage, and Elias can apply one of the following martial masteries to the target:

items.name: Push
entries: If the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 10 feet away from Elias.

items.name: Slow
entries: The target has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 15} Constitution save ends).

action.name: Command
entries: Elias chooses one ally he can see. If the ally can see and hear him, it can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to make one weapon attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

action.name: Flare (1/Round)
entries: Elias chooses a point he can see within 60 feet and fires at flare at it, signaling the Hooded Lantern's bombardment. Elias recharges his Artillery Strike. He can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the first {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} he has taken this round.

action.name: Artillery Strike (Recharge Special)
entries: Elias can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the last {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} he takes this round. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 20-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on the point Elias chose with his Flare {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Elias chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. Elias can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

trait.name: Aura of Hunger
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Lord of the Feast takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Close-Quarters Hunter
entries: Being within 5 feet of a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature doesn't impose {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the Lord of the Feast's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Lord of the Feast's starting hit points and hit dice by 66 ({@dice 7d10 + 28}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Hunter's Sense
entries: The Lord of the Feast has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} creature.

trait.name: Predatory Senses
entries: The Lord of the Feast has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks. He can pinpoint the position of any creature within 120 feet of him with the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Lord of the Feast regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} remaining.

action.name: The Lord of the Feast always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the Lord of the Feast can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Lord of the Feast takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

items.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

items.name: Poison Arrow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 9}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Poison damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition (save ends).

items.name: Ensnaring Arrow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 9}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition ({@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw ends).

items.name: Harpoon Arrow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 9}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Huge or smaller, it is pulled up to 20 feet toward the Lord of the Feast.

action.name: Reposition
entries: The Lord of the Feast moves up to his {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Call of the Hunt (1/Round)
entries: The Lord of the Feast releases a blood-curdling howl that can be heard all across Drakkenheim. All garmyr in the city heed this call and rush towards the Lord of the Feast's current position. Each garmyr within 60 feet who can see and hear the Lord of the Feast can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to move up to half its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and make one melee or ranged attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Lord of the Feast chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. The Lord of the Feast can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: Lucretia casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}, +12 to spell attacks; spells other than cantrips are cast at level 9):

spellcasting.name: Greater Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: Lucretia casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}, +12 to spell attacks; spells other than cantrips are cast at level 9):

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Lucretia Mathias's starting hit points and hit dice by 68 ({@dice 15d8}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Holy Aura
entries: Lucretia projects a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of holy power. At the start of each of her turns, she can choose the aura's effect, which applies to creatures of her choice in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}:

trait.name: Divine Grace
entries: Creatures in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} that target Lucretia with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This effect doesn't protect Lucretia from area effects, such as the explosion of a {@spell Fireball|XPHB}. If Lucretia makes an attack, casts a spell that affects an enemy, or deals damage to another creature, this trait ends until the start of her next turn.

trait.name: Pacifying Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Flame
