entries: A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Radiant damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage.

trait.name: Prescient
entries: Lucretia can't be {@status surprised|XPHB} while she is conscious.

trait.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
entries: When Lucretia dies, her soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in her chest.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Lucretia Mathias is immune to the {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Lucretia is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier (included above).

trait.name: Undeniable Faith
entries: Lucretia automatically succeeds on Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status Concentration|XPHB} on her spells.

action.name: Lucretia always takes her turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On her turn, Lucretia can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on her turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Lucretia takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Pacifying Touch
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one creature within 5 feet of Lucretia. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If this damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, the target is stabilized but has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition for 1 hour, even after regaining {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

items.name: Sacred Flame
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 20}, one creature within 60 feet of Lucretia. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Divine Intervention (1/Day)
entries: Lucretia chooses any spell which doesn't require a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to cast. As part of this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, she casts that spell without Material components. If she uses this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} to cast the {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell, she can't use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} for the next {@dice 1d4} days.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Lucretia chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on her. Lucretia can use this action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

monster.name: Lurker on the Threshold
languages: telepathy 120 ft. understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Traits
entries: The lurker has the traits described in the "Aberrant Traits" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Eldritch Blood
entries: A creature that deals Piercing or Slashing damage to the lurker while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lurker has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lurker makes three Tendril attacks. It can replace each Tendril attack with a use of Cosmic Rays.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 30 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The lurker has ten tendrils, each of which can grapple one creature.

action.name: Cosmic Rays
entries: The lurker randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet (roll {@dice 1d4}; reroll if the lurker has already used that ray this turn):

items.name: Disintegrating Ray
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 27 ({@damage 6d8}) Force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it disintegrates into dust.

items.name: Memory Lapse Ray
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target's memories become distant for 1 minute. While its memories are distant, the target can't take the Magic action, use class features, or understand language, and has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Contaminating Ray
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 16 ({@damage 3d10}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Existential Dread Ray
entries: On the target's next turn, each time it takes an action other than the Dodge action, moves more than 5 feet, or takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

trait.name: Normal Semblance
entries: The dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) checks to disguise itself as, or impersonate, a humanoid creature.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Furious Ambush (Recharges on a Short Rest)
entries: The dreg makes two Dagger attacks.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The dreg takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The troll is immune to the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes two Fiery Claw attacks and one Volcanic Bite attack. It can replace its Volcanic Bite attack with Sulphurous Belch, if available.

action.name: Volcanic Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Claw
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 feet. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Fire).

action.name: Sulfurous Belch (Recharges 5-6)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on the troll. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Fire damage and has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until it or another creature within 5 of it uses an action to clean the ash from their eyes. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Academy Rings (1/Day)
entries: The mage can cast a spell from Spellcasting without expending a use of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mage makes three Prismatic Blast attacks.

action.name: Prismatic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage (mage's choice).

reaction.name: Counterspell {@recharge 5}
entries: The mage casts {@spell Counterspell|XPHB} in response to that spell's trigger, using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The maw vermin has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maw vermin makes one Bite attack and three Claw attacks, and it can use Grasping Maw or Glob Launcher.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is swallowed. A swallowed creature has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, and has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from effects originating outside the maw vermin. At the start of each of the maw vermin's turns, a swallowed creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or gain one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

The maw vermin can swallow up to three creatures at a time. If the maw vermin takes 20+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, the maw vermin must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which land in spaces within 10 feet of the maw vermin with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the maw vermin dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Huge or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, the maw vermin can't use this Claw on another target. The maw vermin has three Claws.

action.name: Grasping Maw
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 18}, one Medium or smaller creature the maw vermin can see within 15 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the maw vermin.

action.name: Glob Launcher
entries: The maw vermin coats a swallowed creature in acidic goo and launches it at a point within 120 feet of it. {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature within 10 feet of the launched creature as it lands (the launched creature automatically fails). {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Minazorond's starting hit points and hit dice by 95 ({@dice 7d12 + 49}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Protective Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Minazorond takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Lightning damage.

trait.name: Construct Resilience
entries: If damage reduces Minazorond to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is Radiant or from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. On a success, Minazorond drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

action.name: Minazorond always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, Minazorond can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Minazorond takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 22}, one creature Minazorond can see within 20 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Force damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Shocking Burst
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one target Minazorond can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Terrifying Roar (Recharges after a Short Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from Minazorond that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Breathe Deep (1/Round)
entries: Minazorond's Breath Weapon recharges. Minazorond can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the first {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it has taken this round.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Special Recharge)
entries: Minazorond uses one of the following breath weapons. It can only use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} if it's the last {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it takes this round.

action.name: Lightning Breath
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 22}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 81 ({@damage 16d8}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Thunder Breath
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 22}, each creature in a 120-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 66 ({@damage 12d10}) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from Minazorond and has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: Double damage, and the target also has the {@condition Deafened|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Minazorond chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. Minazorond can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Draconic Rebuke
entries: {@actTrigger} Minazorond becomes {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. It can use this {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} even if it has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. {@actResponse} All conditions and spells on Minazorond immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can fly up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action and ignoring {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. Minazorond recharges and immediately uses its Terrifying Roar.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: The leech has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks made to hide in aquatic terrain.

trait.name: Memory Bank
entries: The leech has three memory banks in its body. When encountered, roll {@dice 1d3} to determine how many memory banks are filled with grey matter. The rest are empty.

action.name: Attach
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 0 ft. {@h}The leech attaches to the target. While attached, the leech doesn't attack, and moves with the target, using none of the leech's movement. The leech can detach itself using 5 feet of movement, and detaches immediately if its blood bags are filled or if the target dies.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the leech with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check. {@actSaveFail} The leech is still detached, but the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}). Failure by 5 or More: The leech isn't detached and the target takes 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Brain Drain
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature. That creature is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave int} {@dc 11}. {@actSaveFail} The target's Intelligence score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}, and one of the leech's memory banks is filled. If this effect reduces the target's Intelligence score to 0, it has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition until it regains at least 1 point of Intelligence. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the creature finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Thought Transfusion
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature and has at least one filled memory bank. The attached creature gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Intelligence-based {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests} for 1 minute, and the leech empties one of its filled memory banks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The missionary casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Unshakeable Faith (1/Day)
entries: When the missionary would fail a saving throw, it can reroll the save with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. It must use the new roll.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Sacred Fire
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Healing Word (3/Day)
entries: The missionary casts {@spell Healing Word|XPHB} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mutagenist casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Noxious Blood
entries: When a creature hits the mutagenist with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mutagenist makes two Scalpel attacks and uses Forced Mutation.

action.name: Scalpel
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6}).

action.name: Forced Mutation
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature the mutagenist can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains a randomly determined mutation. The mutation lasts for 1 minute, and afterwards, any lost body parts are restored. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Transmogrifying Elixir (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The mutagenist injects itself with a transmogrifying elixir. The mutagenist transforms, using the Grotesque Gargantuan stat block for their altered form. The mutagenist reverts to its normal form after 1 hour or if its transmogrified form is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Anatomical Precision
entries: The mutagenist gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Scalpel attacks until the start of its next turn, as long as it has not moved this turn. The mutagenist's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 0 until the start of its next turn.

reaction.name: Desperate Transformation
entries: {@actTrigger} The mutagenist is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The mutagenist uses Transmogrifying Elixir, if available.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nathaniel casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
entries: When Nathaniel dies, his soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in his chest.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Nathaniel is immune to the {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Sacred Fire
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) Radiant damage.

trait.name: Bloodthirsty
entries: The vampire has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a target with the {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} or {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) Slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) Force damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the vampire's choice (the vampire can't select the same option more than once per turn):

items.name: Poison
entries: The target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Poison damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition (save ends, {@actSave con} {@dc 16}).

items.name: Open Wounds
entries: The target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 3d6}).

items.name: Mindmuddler
entries: The target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends, {@actSave int} {@dc 16}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Necrotic damage, and the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

bonus.name: Meld Into Shadow
entries: In {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, the vampire casts {@spell Invisibility|XPHB} on itself, requiring no components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.

reaction.name: Spectral Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} The vampire takes damage. {@actResponse} The vampire gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to that damage, then moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Forest Sense
entries: The troll can pinpoint the location of creatures and moving objects within 120 feet of it as long as both it and the anything it is detecting is in a natural forested area.

trait.name: Shroud of Leaves
entries: The troll is covered head to toe in a shroud of thick leaves. While it has this shroud it is immune to all damage except Fire damage. If the troll takes any Fire damage, the leaves all burn away revealing the gnarled oak wood body of the troll and it loses this trait.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes two Gnarled Claw attacks and one Bite attack

action.name: Gnarled Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) Piercing damage and if the target is a creature, the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d8}) as thick splinters pierce and remain in the creature's flesh.

bonus.name: Abundant Growth
entries: The troll regains its Shroud of Leaves trait.

bonus.name: Leaf Burst
entries: As long as the troll has its Shroud of Leaves, it can shed its Shroud of Leaves in a burst, losing the trait in the process. {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature within 15 feet of the troll. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Slashing damage and has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Enraged
entries: While {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, the octarine tree gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on all attack rolls.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The octarine tree has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks made to {@action Hide|XPHB} in forests.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The octarine tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The octarine tree makes three attacks.

action.name: Thwack
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed 10 feet and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Crushing Roots
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 20 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The octarine tree can grapple up to four creatures at a time.

action.name: Delerium Fruit
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 10}, range 60/120 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Failure by 5 or More: The target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself.

bonus.name: Take Root
entries: If the octarine tree has not moved this round, it can plant itself into the ground. It regains 18 ({@dice 4d8}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn. While {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the octarine tree has {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Prone|XPHB}, and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, and its AC increases to 20. These benefits end early if the tree takes Fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ratling casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Death Toll
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, one creature the ratling can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Squeak of Doom (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 16}, each {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the ratling that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 55 ({@damage 10d10}) Psychic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Tail Barbs
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the ratling can see within 60 feet succeeds on a {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The ratling forces the triggering creature to reroll the {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} and use the lower roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: The Pale Man casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Aura of Fleshy Insects
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, each creature of the Pale Man's choosing who starts its turn within 60 feet of the Pale Man. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 5d8}) Necrotic damage and the target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

trait.name: Crawling Flesh
entries: When the Pale Man is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, he breaks apart into a swarm of contaminated insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the Pale Man's swarm returns to its cocoon and reforms into the Pale Man {@dice 1d6} days later.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase the Pale Man's starting hit points and hit dice by 76 ({@dice 8d8 + 40}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Insect Body
entries: The Pale Man can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the Pale Man can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect.

action.name: The Pale Man always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, the Pale Man can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Pale Man takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn.

action.name: Contaminating Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Forced Mutation
entries: The Pale Man targets a creature within 60 feet who has one or more mutations and magically alters the mutation. The Pale Man chooses one of the target's existing mutations to remove and replaces it with a different one of his choice.

action.name: Infest the Flesh (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} from the Pale Man. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 5d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 3d8} Necrotic) condition. A target also has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition while it is burning in this way. Failure by 5 or more: The target also has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition (save ends) due to masses of swarming fleshy bugs. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Contaminate (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature {@condition Restrained|XPHB} by the Pale Man's Infest the Flesh action. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

action.name: Abrupt Contaminant (1/Round)
entries: The Pale Man targets a creature within 60 feet who has one or more levels of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. That creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage for each level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} it has.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Pale Man chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on him. The Pale Man can use this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.
Additional Spells If you have access to Dungeons of Drakkenheim or Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim, the Pale Man has the following spells added to his spellbook.
Dungeons of Drakkenheim:
At Will: Delerium Orb, Purge Contamination, Warp Bolt
2/Day Each: Conjure the Deep Haze, Delerium Blast, Forced Evolution
1/Day Each: Octarine Spray, Siphon Contamination Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim:
At Will: Bacterial Barrage, Caustic Grip, Infect
2/Day Each: Blood Worm, Septic Shock, Venomous Aura
1/Day Each: Grievous Wounds, Vile Necrosis

trait.name: Laboratory Adaptation
entries: The pathogenist is immune to disease.

trait.name: Mutated Strains
entries: The pathogenist's attacks and effects ignore the target's {@spell Resistance|XPHB} or {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison damage and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition and disease.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pathogenist makes two Poison Needle attacks.

action.name: Poison Needle
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Poison damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it is stabilized and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 hour, even if it regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Pestilent Infection {@recharge 5}
entries: The pathogenist infects one creature it can see within 30 feet with a magical disease. At the start of each of its turns, the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target gaines one {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level. Third Success: The disease ends.

action.name: Plague Wind (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 5d8}) Poison damage plus 23 ({@damage 5d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If the target has 25 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or fewer after taking this damage, it dies and its flesh turns to ash, leaving a weathered skeleton.

bonus.name: Heightened Tolerance
entries: The pathogenist ends the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} or {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition on itself.

reaction.name: Outbreak
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the pathogenist can see that is infected by its Pestilent Infection is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or dies. {@actResponse} The pathogenist spreads the disease to another creature it can see within 30 feet of the infected creature.

trait.name: Spell Vessel
entries: After using its Consume Spell {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}, the phage stores the spell until the spell is digested or the phage dies. When the phage dies, the spell takes effect. If the original caster of the spell sees the phage die, it can choose the area or target(s) of the spell as if they had cast it from the phage's space. Otherwise, the spell affects a random area or target(s) from those within range.

trait.name: Warped Space
entries: The phage magically warps space in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. Attacks targeting the phage from outside the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}, and the phage has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and effects that originate from outside the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Piercing damage. If the phage isn't storing a spell, it makes this attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} and deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage on a hit.

action.name: Spit
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 60/120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Acid damage.

action.name: Digest Spell
entries: The phage digests the spell it has stored, teleporting to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet and making a Spit attack with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Consume Spell
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 120 feet of the phage casts a spell while the phage isn't storing a spell. {@actResponse} The spell has no effect and is stored in the phage.

trait.name: Unshakeable Faith (1/Day)
entries: When the pilgrim would fail a saving throw, it can reroll the save with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}. It must use the new roll.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Plague Symptoms
entries: The plague carrier is host to a disease created by a pathogenist, chosen from the options below. A creature infected by this disease is subjected to the chosen effect at the start of each of its turns. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target suffers the disease's effect. Third Success: The disease ends.

trait.name: Coughing Fits
entries: The target is unable to speak until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Fatigue
entries: The target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced by 5 feet until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Shivers
entries: The target shakes uncontrollably. Each time it fails its saving throw, it drops whatever it is holding.

action.name: Festering Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 2}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target is infected with the plague carrier's Plague Symptoms.

action.name: Bile Spreader
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage, and the target is infected with the plague carrier's Plague Symptoms. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Absorption
entries: When the abomination kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead, it absorbs the corpse into its body and regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The abomination can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The abomination can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abomination makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}) and the abomination uses Engulf on the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The abomination engulfs a Large or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it. Until the grapple ends the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, is suffocating, and has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the abomination. If the abomination moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The abomination can have only one creature engulfed at a time. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. The engulfed creature repeats the save at the start of each of the abomination's turns Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

monster.name: Psychophant
languages: Common (only repeats phrases it has heard)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychophant makes two Psychic Grasp attacks.

action.name: Psychic Grasp
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage and the target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (Wisdom saving throw {@dc 14} save ends).

action.name: Final Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 40 ({@damage 9d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage, and the target is immune to this psychophant's Final Scream for 24 hours.

action.name: Shape-Shift
entries: The psychophant shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid it has seen or reverts to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form.

bonus.name: Life Siphon
entries: The psychophant deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage to a creature it damaged this turn with Psychic Grasp, then regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The psychophant teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. It can bring one creature {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} by its Psychic Grasp, which teleports to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the psychophant's destination space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maunder makes one Grasp or Bite attack against each creature within its reach. Alternatively, it makes two Eye Beam attacks.

action.name: Grasp
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). The maunder has countless hands and can grapple any number of creatures.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the maunder. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage. A {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} target that is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the maunder is {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} against this attack.

action.name: Eye Beam
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 6}, range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Babble
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the maunder that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: The Queen of Thieves casts one of the following spells, requiring no Verbal or Somatic components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, +10 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Canny Defense
entries: While the Queen of Thieves is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Intelligence modifier (included above).

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Queen of Thieves's starting hit points and hit dice by 83 ({@dice 15d8 + 15}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Masked Identity
entries: The Queen of Thieves is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Memory Thief
entries: Creatures are not aware when the Queen of Thieves reads their thoughts or imposes the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition on them. Additionally, when a spell cast by the her that causes creatures to become {@condition Charmed|XPHB} ends, she can make affected creatures lose their memories. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or forget up to 8 hours of the time spent {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by her. These memories can be restored with a {@spell Heal|XPHB} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Vexing Aura
entries: The Queen of Thieves projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of bewitching magic. At the start of each of her turns, she can choose the aura's effect, which applies to creatures of her choice in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}:

trait.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until it ends its turn outside the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. If she deals damage to the creature, the condition ends, and that creature is immune to her Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Mocking Laughter
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

action.name: The Queen of Thieves always takes her turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On her turn, she can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on her turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, she takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: +3 Rapier
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 13}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) Piercing damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Cutting Words
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 18}, one creature within 120 feet of the Queen of Thieves. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} it makes before the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Dash
entries: The Queen of Thieves moves up to her {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Misdirection (1/Round)
entries: The Queen of Thieves becomes {@condition Invisible|XPHB} and teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 60 feet. At the same time, an illusory double of her appears where she was standing. The illusory double, as well as the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition, end if the Queen of Thieves attacks or casts a spell, or after 1 minute.

Epic {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} The Queen of Thieves chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on her. She can use this action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Rat Crown Prince's starting hit points and hit dice by 45 ({@dice 6d8 + 24}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rat Crown-Prince has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Verminous Aura
entries: The Rat Crown-Prince emits a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of verminous contamination. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: The Rat Crown-Prince always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, The Rat Crown Prince can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Rat Crown-Prince takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Contaminated Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Delerium-Infused Blades
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Necrotic damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the Rat Crown-Prince's choice (he can't select the same option more than once per round):

items.name: Poison
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 minute (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Acid Burn
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 3d6} Acid). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Mindkiller
entries: If the target is maintaining {@status Concentration|XPHB} on a spell, it takes an extra 25 ({@damage 5d10}) Psychic damage unless it chooses to end its {@status Concentration|XPHB}.

action.name: Call Ratlings (1/Round)
entries: {@dice 2d4} Ratling Warriors appear, burrowing up from below unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the Rat Crown-Prince. The warriors have 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} each and remain until killed.

action.name: Meld into Shadow (1/Round)
entries: The Rat Crown-Prince has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition until he makes an attack.

action.name: Swift Stride
entries: The Rat Crown-Prince moves up to his {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Rat Crown-Prince chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. The Rat Crown-Prince can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase the Rat God's starting hit points and hit dice by 116 ({@dice 8d12 + 64}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Mass of Tails
entries: Ranged attacks against the Rat God from further than 60 feet away have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Verminous Aura
entries: The Rat God is surrounded by a 60-foot radius of vermin, pouring out of it and spilling over into the area as they claw and gnash. The area is {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} and a creature that starts its turn in the area takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: The Rat God always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the Rat God can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Rat God takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Flail of Skulls
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 16}, reach 15 ft. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 3d6} Acid).

items.name: Great Feeding
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 26}, each creature within 60 feet of the Rat God. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Sickened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The Rat God regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

action.name: Rodent Rifts (1/Round)
entries: The Rat God teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of the Rat God when it arrives is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 26}. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the Rat God.

action.name: Warp Bolt
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 22}, one creature the Rat God can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 23 ({@damage 4d12}) Necrotic damage, and the target suffers a {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Infernal Chittering
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 26}, one creature the Rat God can see within 60 feet that can hear the Rat God. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Rat God chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The Rat God can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Rat King casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Rat King makes two Tail Whip attacks, then uses Psychic Blast or Spellcasting.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 8d6 + 5}) Psychic damage. {@actSave int} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions until the end of the Rat King's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Psychic damage, and the target is {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} {@dice 1d10} (save ends).

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rat Prince has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Rat Prince has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the Rat Prince's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Rat Prince makes three attacks: two with his Shortswords and one with his Contaminated Bite.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Contaminated Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 11}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 6}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The Rat Prince takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Sacrificial Pawn
entries: {@actTrigger} The Rat Prince is targeted by an attack or spell that targets only him. {@actResponse} The Rat Prince redirects the attack or spell to another ratling within 5 feet of him, causing the ratling to become the target instead.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratling makes three Repeating Crossbow attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Piercing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of one of the following types (the ratling's choice each time it attacks): Acid, Cold, Fire, or Poison.

action.name: Delerium Bomb {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 10-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point the ratling can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} An Arcane Anomaly occurs in the area.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Covering Fire
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature reduces an ally the ratling can see to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The ratling makes a ranged attack against that creature.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Poison-Tipped Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Shield Shove
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 13}, one creature within reach of the ratling. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the ratling and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Contaminated Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target also gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Plaguebringer Aura
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, a creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ratling. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Filthy Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Infection (3/Day)
entries: The ratling causes one creature it can see within 60 feet to be infected with a disease. At the start of each of its turns, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution SavingThrow: {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 2d12}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. After three successes, the disease ends. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell ends the disease early.

action.name: Metastasize
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, one creature within 15 feet that is infected with a disease. {@actSaveFail} The target has one of the following conditions (the ratling's choice): {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, {@condition Clumsy|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, or {@condition Enfeebled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} (save ends). The condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the ratling uses Metastasize on the target again. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Rampant Sickness
entries: The ratling spreads its Infection from an infected target to another creature adjacent to that target.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Ravenous Flora's starting hit points and hit dice by 42 ({@dice 4d10 + 20}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Writhing Aura
entries: The ground within 30 feet of the ravenous flora is filled with plant roots and becomes {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage.

trait.name: Poison Ivy
entries: If the ravenous flora would take Poison damage, it instead takes no damage and regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Poison damage it would have received.

action.name: The ravenous flora always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the ravenous flora can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the ravenous flora takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the ravenous flora can't Bite another target.

items.name: Spit Acid
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Swallow
entries: The ravenous flora makes one Bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it has {@condition Grappled|XPHB}. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. The swallowed target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from attacks and effects outside the flora, and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage at the start of each of its turns. The flora can have up to four targets swallowed at a time.

If the flora takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of it. If the flora dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Hypnotic Pollen (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the ravenous flora. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). While {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target must spend all of its movement on each of its turns to move directly toward the ravenous flora. During this movement, the target ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} caused by the flora's Writhing Aura.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The ravenous flora chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The ravenous flora can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ghoul has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ghoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Rancid Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The ghoul moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The reality cyst is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Unhinged Reality
entries: The reality cyst emits a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of unhinged reality. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until it leaves the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. While {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target believes itself to be in an altered and confused environment of shifting forms, and can't see or hear anything else. The target does not perceive itself to be stationary, and instead believes it is walking through a bizarre landscape. It can take an action on its turn to repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the reality cyst's Unhinged Reality for 24 hours.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The reality cyst doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Psychic Whip
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the reality cyst's next turn. The reality cyst can target a creature {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} by its Unhinged Reality with this attack even if the creature has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}.

bonus.name: Feed
entries: Each creature {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} by Unhinged Reality takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage. The reality cyst regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the total damage dealt, and its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} Maximum increases by the same amount.

reaction.name: Fracture
entries: {@actTrigger} The reality cyst takes damage. {@actResponse d}{@actSave int} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reality cyst. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

monster.name: Reautomata
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: If damage reduces the reautomata to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. On a success, the reautomata drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The reautomata's {@variantrule Long Jump|XPHB} is up to 50 feet and its {@variantrule High Jump|XPHB} is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reautomata makes two Arm Blade attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the reautomata and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Entrapping Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft., one {@condition Prone|XPHB} target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the reautomata can't make Entrapping Rend attacks against another target.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The reautomata moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see. This movement doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

monster.name: Reautomata Wrecker
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The reautomata deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reautomata makes one Drill attack and one Wrecking Ball attack.

action.name: Drill
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Wrecking Ball
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 20 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage. {@actSave str} {@dc 20}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends) and the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Destructive Rampage {@recharge}
entries: The reautomata moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a straight line, moving through the space of any Medium or smaller creature on its path. The first time its enters each creature's space during this move, it can make a Drill or Wrecking Ball attack against that creature.

bonus.name: Overdrive Engine (1/Day; Bloodied Only)
entries: The reautomata's Destructive Rampage recharges, and it gains {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to all damage and conditions until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the reautomata automatically succeeds on all saving throws and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution-based ability checks and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls. It can't be forced to move or affected by spells of level 8 or lower unless it chooses to be. Features and effects that ignore {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB|Resistances} and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB|Immunities}, such as a Vorpal Weapon, don't function against the reautomata unless those effects are caused by a level 9 spell or an artifact.

At the end of its next turn, the reautomata dies and explodes. {@actSave dex} {@dc 20}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reautomata when it dies. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Ascendant Transformation
entries: When Vladimir von Drakken drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, his body explodes in a shower of gore and he reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet as Ascendant Vladimir von Drakken. His {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} doesn't change.

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Vladimir von Drakken takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Bloodthirsty
entries: Vladimir von Drakken has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a target with the {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} or {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Daywalker
entries: Vladimir von Drakken doesn't possess any Vampire Weaknesses from the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Epic Boss Hit Points
entries: Increase Vladimir von Drakken's starting hit points and hit dice by 95 ({@dice 10d8 + 50}) for each player character above four, or reduce its starting hit points and hit dice by that amount for each player character below four.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Vladimir von Drakken regains 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} remaining.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Vladimir von Drakken can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Vladimir von Drakken always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Vladimir von Drakken can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Vladimir von Drakken takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bloodmourne
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}). In addition, Vladimir von Drakken can apply one of the following martial maneuvers to the target:

items.name: Advance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken pushes the target 15 feet, then moves up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

items.name: Hamstring
entries: The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Overpower
entries: The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 20}).

action.name: Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 20}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 49 ({@damage 14d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 20} Constitution save ends). Vladimir von Drakken regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. A Humanoid killed by this damage rises on its next turn as a Vampire Spawn under Vladimir von Drakken's control.

action.name: Dominate (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one creature Vladimir von Drakken can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. While {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, the target obeys Vladimir von Drakken's commands and can't take Reactions. Failure by 5 or More: The {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition lasts 24 hours or until Vladimir von Drakken is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Each time the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. {@actSaveSuccess} The target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its next attack roll against Vladimir von Drakken.

action.name: Wing Blast (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 20}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from Vladimir von Drakken. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from Vladimir von Drakken and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Before or after using this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, Vladimir von Drakken can move up to half his {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Shadow Step (2/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet that is in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}. He has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next melee attack he makes before the end of this round.

action.name: Shape-Shift (1/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken shape-shifts into a Tiny bat ({@variantrule Speed|XPHB} 5 ft., {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist ({@variantrule Speed|XPHB} 5 ft., {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} 20 ft. [hover]), or he returns to his vampire form. Anything he is wearing transforms with him.

While in bat or mist form, Vladimir von Drakken can't speak. His game statistics, other than his size and {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, are unchanged, but he can't use {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} other than Shape-Shift and Epic {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB}. While in mist form, Vladimir von Drakken can't speak or manipulate objects, and loses his Aura of Dread. He is weightless and can enter an enemy's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can't pass through liquid. He has {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to all damage.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. He can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

reaction.name: Spell-Reflecting Strike
entries: {@actTrigger} Vladimir von Drakken makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses him. {@actResponse} Vladimir von Drakken can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) he can see within 120 feet of him. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of Vladimir von Drakken. If the spell forces a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Ripper
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Dismemberment
entries: Creatures killed by attacks made by the ripper can't be restored to life except by a {@spell Resurrection|XPHB} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Feed on Fear
entries: {@condition Frightened|XPHB} creatures have the {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and {@condition Defenseless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions against attacks made by the ripper.

trait.name: Insensitive to Pain
entries: Critical Hits against the ripper become normal hits.

action.name: Whirling Bonesaw
